K10bsu019_u:7: ekasmin samaye bhagavān śrāvastyāṃ viharati sma jetavane 'nāthapiṇḍadasyārāme mahatā bhikṣusaṃghena sārdhamardhatrayodaśabhirbhikṣuśataiḥ saṃbahulaiśca bodhisattvaśatasahasraiḥ /
K10bsu019_u:29: anye ca dvātriṃśaddevanikāyā devaputrāḥ saṃnipatitā maheśvaranārāyaṇadevaputrapūrvaṃgamāḥ /
K10bsu019_u:30: śakro devānāmindro brahmā ca sahāṃpatiścandrādityavāyuvaruṇādayo devaputrāḥ saṃnipatitāstasmin parṣadi /
K10bsu019_u:70: evaṃpramukhāṇi anekāni kinnararājaśatasahasrāṇi saṃnipatitāni tasmin parṣadi /
K10bsu019_u:124: evaṃpramukhāṇyanekāni nāgakanyā śatasahasrāṇi saṃnipatitāni tasmin parṣadi /
K10bsu019_u:233: tadā avīcau mahānarake raśmayo niścaranti sma /
K10bsu019_u:235: sarve te vihārapariśobhitā eva dṛśyante sma /
K10bsu019_u:239: layane layane suvarṇarūpyamayāni dvārāṇi dṛśyante sma /
K10bsu019_u:240: layane layane suvarṇarūpyamayāni sopānāni dṛśyante sma /
K10bsu019_u:245: bahirjetavanasya purata udyāne nānāvidhāni kalpavṛkṣāṇi dṛśyante sma /
K10bsu019_u:253: tena tatra ca ramyāvabhāse tādṛśāni kalpavṛkṣaśatasahasrāṇi prādurbhūtāni /
K10bsu019_u:254: tasminneva jetavanavihāre vajramayāṇi sopānāni dṛśyante sma,
K10bsu019_u:263: ityevaṃ tasmin jetavanavihāre samantataḥ pariśobhitāni dṛśyante sma //
K10bsu019_u:267: atha tasminneva parṣanmadhye sarvanīvaraṇaviṣkambhī nāma bodhisattvo mahāsattva utthāyāsanādekāṃsamuttarāsaṅgaṃ
K10bsu019_u:268: kṛtvā dakṣiṇaṃ jānumaṇḍalaṃ pṛthivyāṃ pratiṣṭhāpya yena bhagavāṃstenāñjaliṃ praṇamya
K10bsu019_u:273: kulaputro 'vīcau mahānarake āryāvalokiteśvaro bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ praviṣṭaḥ /
K10bsu019_u:276: atha sarvanīvaraṇaviṣkambhī bodhisattvo mahāsattvo bhagavantametadavocat - bhagavan,
K10bsu019_u:279: tatrāsya dharmaṃ deśayati - yasyāḥ kuḍyaprākāraparyantā ayomayī bhūmiḥ samanantaraprajvalitaikajvālībhūtā,
K10bsu019_u:283: yathā bahvayudakāyāṃ sthālyāṃ mudgā vā māṣā vā cordhvaṃ gacchanto 'dho gacchantaḥ svidyante pacyante,
K10bsu019_u:286: tatkathaṃ bhagavan avīcau mahānarake 'valokiteśvaro bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ praviśati?
K10bsu019_u:287: bhagavānāha - yathā kulaputra rājā cakravartī divyaratnamayodyāne praviśati mahatyā cakravartirājyasamṛddhayā,
K10bsu019_u:288: evameva kulaputra avalokiteśvaro bodhisattvo mahāsattvastasminnavīcau mahānarake praviśati /
K10bsu019_u:292: tadā te yamapālapurūṣāḥ saṃvegacittāḥ paramodvignāścintāṃ samāpadyante - kimasminnavīcau mahānarake 'śubhanimittaṃ prādurbhūtam?
K10bsu019_u:297: atha te yamapālapurūṣā asimusalabhindipālatomaragadācakratriśūlādīnupasaṃgṛhya sarvaṃ cāvīcipariṣkāraṃ gṛhītvā yena sa yamo dharmarājastenopasaṃkrāntāḥ
K10bsu019_u:298: upasaṃkramya yamaṃ dharmarājametadavocan - yatkhalu devo jānīyāt prathamam - sā cāsmākaṃ karmabhūmirniravaśeṣaṃ parikṣīṇā abhiramaṇīyā saṃvṛttā sarvasukhasamarpitā /
K10bsu019_u:299: yamo dharmarājastānuvāca - kiṃkāraṇaṃ yuṣmākamapi karmabhūmiḥ parikṣīṇā?
K10bsu019_u:301: yatkhalu devo jānīyāt prathamam - tasminnavīcimahānarake 'śubhanimittaṃ prādurbhūtam /
K10bsu019_u:303: kāmarūpī ca tatra puruṣaḥ praviṣṭo jaṭāmukuṭadharo divyālaṃkārabhūṣitaśarīraḥ paramamaitramānasaḥ suvarṇabimbamiva dṛśyate /
K10bsu019_u:308: atha sa yamo dharmarājaścintāmāpede - kasya punardevasyāyaṃ prabhāvaḥ?
K10bsu019_u:311: athavā anyeṣāṃ maharddhikadevaputrāṇāmapi varapradānenedṛśaṃ phalaviśeṣaṃ saṃvṛttam?
K10bsu019_u:315: sa ca divyena cakṣuṣā vyavalokya tacca devanikāyena paśyati sma - īdṛśaṃ varaṃ kasyānyasya?
K10bsu019_u:316: atha sa punarevāvīcau mahānarake vyavalokayati sma /
K10bsu019_u:317: vyavalokya tasminnevāvīcau mahānarake 'valokiteśvaraṃ bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvameva paśyati sma //
K10bsu019_u:318: atha sa yamo dharmarājo yenāvalokiteśvaro bodhisattvo mahāsattvastenopasaṃkrāntaḥ /
K10bsu019_u:319: upasaṃkramya bhagavataḥ pādau śirasābhivandya stotraviśeṣaṃ kartumārabdhaḥ /
K10bsu019_u:378: evaṃ yamo dharmarājo viśeṣataraṃ srotāvadhānaṃ kṛtvā punarapi yamo dharmarājaḥ triḥ pradakṣiṇīkṛtya tatraiva prakrānto 'bhūt //
K10bsu019_u:382: atha sarvanīvaraṇaviṣkambhī bhagavantametadavocat - kadā bhagavannāgacchati avalokiteśvaro bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ?
K10bsu019_u:383: bhagavānāha - eṣa kulaputra avīcīmahānarakānniṣkramya pretanagaraṃ praviṣṭaḥ /
K10bsu019_u:384: tatrānekāni pretaśatasahasrāṇi purastāddhāvanti sma dagdhasthūṇākṛtibhirasthiyantravaducchritaiḥ parvatodarasaṃnibhaiḥ sūcīcchidropamamukhaiḥ
K10bsu019_u:388: sa ca dvārapālapurūṣa udbaddhabhiṇḍipālaḥ kālakūṭavyagrahasto lohitākṣaḥ /
K10bsu019_u:389: satatamasyānubhāvena maitracittaṃ saṃbhāvayati - na ca me īdṛśena karmabhūminā kṛtyam //
K10bsu019_u:390: athāryāvalokiteśvaro bodhisattvo mahāsattvastaṃ ca sattvanikāyaṃ dṛṣṭvā mahākaruṇācittamutpādya daśabhyo hastāṅgulībhyo daśa vaitaraṇīrniṣkrāmayati
K10bsu019_u:392: atikaruṇābhibhūtacetasā avalokiteśvarasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya teṣāṃ sattvānāmantike sarvaromakūpebhyo 'ṣṭāṅgavāriparipūrṇā mahānadyo niṣkrāmanti /
K10bsu019_u:397: tadā mānuṣikīṃ cetanāmupādāyaiva sāṃsārikīṃ cintāṃ vicintayanti - aho bata te jāmbudvīpakā manuṣyāḥ sukhitāḥ,
K10bsu019_u:403: te satpurūṣāḥ sacetanā ye mahāyānaṃ satatasamitamavagāhayanti /
K10bsu019_u:404: te satpuruṣā ye āryāstān gomārgāya vāsamupavasanti /
K10bsu019_u:406: te satpuruṣāḥ ye truṭitasphuṭitān vihārān pratisaṃskāraṃ kurvanti,
K10bsu019_u:408: te satpuruṣā ye pūrvikāni stūpabimbāni truṭitasphuṭitāni viśīrṇabhūtāni pratisaṃskāraṃ kurvanti /
K10bsu019_u:409: te satpuruṣā ye dharmabhāṇakāṃllekhakān dhārakān vācakān sūtrarājasya śrāvakān satatasamitaṃ parisevanti copatiṣṭhanti ca /
K10bsu019_u:410: te satpurūṣā ye tathāgataprātihāryāṇi vividhāni ca tathāgatacaṃkramaṇāni dharmasarāṇi ca paśyanti /
K10bsu019_u:413: te satpuruṣā ye bodhisattvavikurvitāni caṃkramaṇāni paśyanti /
K10bsu019_u:414: ityevaṃ te pretaviṣayaṃ śarīramanuvicintya mānasānāṃ kāmānāmabhāvopapattiṃ prati parityajanti /
K10bsu019_u:416: tadā teṣāṃ viṃśatiśikhara samudgataṃ satkāyadṛṣṭiśailaṃ jñānavajreṇa bhittvā sarve te sukhāvatyāṃ lokadhātāvupapannāḥ ākāṅkṣitamukhā nāma bodhisattvā upapannāḥ /
K10bsu019_u:417: athāvalokiteśvaro yadā te sattvadhātavaḥ parimokṣitāḥ suparimuktāśca,
K10bsu019_u:427: nāsti kulaputra īdṛśaṃ pratibhānaṃ tathāgatānāmapi yādṛśamāryāvalokiteśvarasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya //
K10bsu019_u:428: atha sarvanīvaraṇaviṣkambhī āha - kena prakāreṇa bhagavan?
K10bsu019_u:429: bhagavānāha - bhūtapūrvaṃ kulaputra vipaśyī nāma tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddho
K10bsu019_u:430: loka udapādi vidyācaraṇasaṃpannaḥ sugato lokavidanuttaraḥ puruṣadamyasārathiḥ śāstā
K10bsu019_u:431: devānāṃ ca manuṣyāṇāṃ ca buddho bhagavān /
K10bsu019_u:432: tena kālena tena samayenāhaṃ sarvanīvaraṇaniṣkambhin sugandhamukho nāma vaṇikputro 'bhūvam /
K10bsu019_u:433: tadā me śrutā vipaśyinastathāgatasya sakāśādāryāvalokiteśvarasya guṇodbhāvanā //
K10bsu019_u:434: atha sarvanīvaraṇaviṣkambhī bhagavantametadavocat - kīdṛśī tvayā bhagavan guṇodbhāvanā śrutā?
K10bsu019_u:437: yādṛśī tvayā bhagavan guṇodbhāvanā āryāvalokiteśvarasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya śrutā //
K10bsu019_u:448: athāryāvalokiteśvaro bodhisattvo mahāsattvo maheśvaraṃ devaputrametadavocat - bhaviṣyasi tvaṃ maheśvaraḥ kaliyuge pratipanne /
K10bsu019_u:454: īdṛśaṃ mayā kulaputra vipaśyinastathāgatasya sakāśādāryāvalokiteśvarasya guṇodbhāvanā śrutā //
K10bsu019_u:455: tadapyatikramya śikhī nāma tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddho babhūva vidyācaraṇasaṃpannaḥ sugato lokavidanuttaraḥ puruṣadamyasārathiḥ śāstā devānāṃ ca manuṣyāṇāṃ ca buddho bhagavān /
K10bsu019_u:456: tena kālena tena samayenāhaṃ sarvanīvaraṇaviṣkambhin dānaśūro nāma bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'bhūvam /
K10bsu019_u:457: tasya śikhinastathāgatasya sakāśādavalokiteśvarasya bodhisattvasya mahāsatvasya guṇodbhāvanā śrutā //
K10bsu019_u:461: atha sarvanīvaraṇaviṣkambhī bhagavantametadavocat - kīdṛśī bhagavaṃstvayā guṇodbhāvanā avalokiteśvarasya śrutā?
K10bsu019_u:462: bhagavānāha - yadā sarvadevā nāgā yakṣā gandharvā rākṣasā asurā maruto garūḍā gandharvāḥ kinnarā mahoragā manuṣyāḥ saṃnipatitāḥ saṃniṣaṇṇā abhūvan,
K10bsu019_u:464: mahāsaṃnipātaṃ dṛṣṭvā tāsāṃ parṣadāṃ madhye dharmasāṃkathyaṃ kartumārabdhaḥ /
K10bsu019_u:465: tadā bhagavato mukhadvārānnānāvarṇā anekaraśmayo niḥsaranti sma /
K10bsu019_u:467: niścaritvā ca daśadigvidikṣu sarvān lokān dhātunavabhāsya punarevāgatya taṃ śikhinaṃ bhagavantaṃ triḥpradakṣiṇīkṛtya bhagavato mukhadvāre praviṣṭāḥ
K10bsu019_u:472: atha tasminneva parṣadi ratnapāṇirnāma bodhisattvo mahāsattva utthāyāsanādekāṃsamuttarāsaṅgaṃ
K10bsu019_u:473: kṛtvā dakṣiṇaṃ jānumaṇḍalaṃ pṛthivyāṃ pratiṣṭhāpya yena bhagavāṃstenāñjaliṃ praṇamya
K10bsu019_u:477: bhagavānāha - eṣa kulaputra avalokiteśvaraḥ sukhāvatyā lokadhātorāgacchati,
K10bsu019_u:478: tasya āgacchamānasyedaṃ mayedṛśaṃ nimittaṃ prādurbhūtaṃ darśitam //
K10bsu019_u:479: atha ratnapāṇirnāma bodhisattva āha - kīdṛśāni tāni nimittāni?
K10bsu019_u:481: bhagavānāha - yadā kulaputra avalokiteśvaro bodhisattvo mahāsattva āgacchati,
K10bsu019_u:493: tadyathā - hastiratnaṃ maniratnaṃ aśvaratnaṃ strīratnaṃ gṛhapatiratnaṃ pariṇāyakaratnam /
K10bsu019_u:496: yadā āryāvalokiteśvaro bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ sukhāvatyā lokadhātorniṣkrāntaḥ,
K10bsu019_u:498: atha ratnapāṇirbodhisattvo mahāsattvo bhagavantametadavocat - kasya nimittāni bhagavan?
K10bsu019_u:499: bhagavānāha - eṣa kulaputra āryāvalokiteśvaro mahāsattvo bodhisattva āgacchati,
K10bsu019_u:501: yadā sa calati tadā manoramaṃ padmavarṣaḥ patati /
K10bsu019_u:502: tadā avalokiteśvaro sahasrapatrāṇi padmāni suvarṇadaṇḍāni vaidūryanirbhāsāni gṛhītvā yena bhagavāṃstenopasaṃkrāntaḥ /
K10bsu019_u:503: upasaṃkramya bhagavataḥ pādau śirasābhivandya bhagavatastāni padmānyupanāmayati sma - imāni te bhagavannamitābhena tathāgatenārhatā samyaksaṃbuddhena prahitāni /
K10bsu019_u:504: sa tathāgataḥ pṛcchati anātaṅkatāṃ laghutāṃ sukhasparśavihāritāṃ ca /
K10bsu019_u:505: tato bhagavatā padmāni gṛhītvā vāmapārśve sthāpitāni /
K10bsu019_u:506: tadā aryāvalokiteśvarasya guṇodbhāvanāṃ kurute - kīdṛśī tvayā avalokiteśvara karmabhūmirniṣpāditā sadā preteṣu avīcāvupapanneṣu?
K10bsu019_u:513: mahānarake ye upapannāḥ sattvāsteṣāṃ ca karmabhūmiṃ dṛṣṭvā tatra mayā sattvaparipāko me kṛtaḥ kartavyaśca /
K10bsu019_u:514: kṛtvā sarve ca anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau pratiṣṭhāpayitavyāḥ /
K10bsu019_u:516: yāvatsamantāddaśabhyo digbhyaḥ sarvākṣaṇopapannāḥ sattvā arūpaviśeṣe nirvāṇadhātau na pratiṣṭhāpitā bhaveyuḥ //
K10bsu019_u:517: athāvalokiteśvaro bodhisattva idaṃ praśnavyāhāraṃ kṛtvā bhagavataḥ pādau śirasābhivandya ekānte prakāntaḥ,
K10bsu019_u:523: atha ratnapāṇirbodhisattvo bhagavantametadavocat - paripṛccheyamahaṃ bhagavan praśnavyāharaṇamuddeśam - kidṛśo 'valokiteśvarasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya puṇyasaṃbhāraḥ?
K10bsu019_u:525: nirdeśayāmi asyāvalokiteśvarasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya nāmagrahaṇāt puṇyasaṃbhārasya pramāṇam /
K10bsu019_u:526: tadyathā - api nāma kulaputra kecideva sattvā gaṅgānadīvālukopamāstathāgatā arhantaḥ
K10bsu019_u:531: tadyathā - api nāma kulaputra dvādaśamāsikena saṃvatsareṇa caturmahādvīpeṣu rātriṃdivamavicchinnaṃ devo varṣati,
K10bsu019_u:533: na tu kulaputra avalokiteśvarasya śakyaṃ mayā puṇyasaṃbhāraṃ gaṇayitum /
K10bsu019_u:538: na tu kulaputra avalokiteśvarasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya śakyate puṇyasaṃbhāraṃ gaṇayitum /
K10bsu019_u:539: tadyathāpi nāma kulaputra caturmahādvīpeṣu ye keciccatuṣpādā siṃhavyāghraṛkṣatarakṣumṛgoṣṭraśṛgālādayo gogardabhāḥ paśavaḥ hastino 'śvā mahiṣā
K10bsu019_u:540: eteṣu catuṣpadeṣu śakyate mayaikaikaṃ romaṃ gaṇayitum /
K10bsu019_u:541: na tu kulaputra avalokiteśvarasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya śakyate puṇyasaṃbhāraṃ gaṇayitum /
K10bsu019_u:542: tadyathāpi nāma kulaputra kaścideva kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā paramāṇurajopamāstathāgatā arhataḥ samyaksaṃbuddhā divyasauvarṇaratnamayān stūpān
K10bsu019_u:544: tacchakyaṃ mayā kulaputra teṣāṃ sauvarṇarajatamayānāṃ tathāgatānāṃ karaṇeṣu puṇyaskandhaṃ gaṇayitum /
K10bsu019_u:545: na tu kulaputra avalokiteśvarasya bodhisattvasya śakyate puṇyasaṃbhāraṃ gaṇayitum /
K10bsu019_u:546: tadyathāpi nāma kulaputra śakyate mayā śīrṣavanasyaikaikaṃ patrāṇi gaṇayitum,
K10bsu019_u:547: na tvavalokiteśvarasya śakyate mayā puṇyasaṃbhāraṃ gaṇayitum /
K10bsu019_u:548: tadyathāpi nāma kulaputra caturmahādvīpeṣu strīpuruṣadārakadārikāste sarve srotāpattiphale sakṛdāgāmiphale 'nāgāmiphale 'rhattve pratyekabodhau niyojayeyam /
K10bsu019_u:554: atha ratnapāṇirbodhisattvo mahāsattvo bhagavantametadavocat - na me bhagavana kvacidīdṛśaḥ acintyastathāgatānāṃ puṇyaskandho dṛṣṭo vā śruto vā prāgeva bodhisattvabhūtasya,
K10bsu019_u:556: bhagavānāha - yatkhalu kulaputra mama sadṛśāḥ gaṅgānadīvālukopamāstathāgatā arhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhā bhaveyuḥ,
K10bsu019_u:559: te ca tathāgatā arhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhāḥ sarvathaikatra saṃnipātyante /
K10bsu019_u:560: sarve avalokiteśvarasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya na śankuvanti puṇyaskandhaṃ gaṇayitum /
K10bsu019_u:561: prāgeva kulaputra ahamekākī asmin lokadhātau viharāmi,
K10bsu019_u:562: tatkathaṃ śaknuyāṃ tasya puṇyaskandhaṃ vācā vyāhartum?
K10bsu019_u:563: api ca kulaputra sarve tathāgatā daśabhyo vāgbhiḥ evaṃ vācamabhāṣanta - te sattvāḥ sukhitā loke bhavanti,
K10bsu019_u:567: te śuklapāṇḍarapaṭā iva rājahaṃsāḥ plutavāyuvegā iva gacchanti sukhāvatīlokadhātumamitābhasya tathāgatasya saṃmukhaṃ dharmaśravaṇāya /
K10bsu019_u:568: dharmaṃ śrutvā ca sāṃsārikaṃ duḥkhaṃ teṣāṃ kāye na bādhate,
K10bsu019_u:570: na ca teṣāṃ kṣutpipāsā duḥkhaṃ kāye na bādhate,
K10bsu019_u:573: dharmarasena pūryamāṇāḥ satataparigrahaṃ vyavasthāpitāḥ tāvadasmiṃllokadhātau tiṣṭhanti,
K10bsu019_u:574: yāvadavalokiteśvarasya bodhisattvasya dṛḍhapratijñā na paripūritā bhavati - sarvasattvā sarvaduḥkhebhyaḥ parimokṣitāḥ yāvadanuttarāyāḥ samyaksaṃbodhau na pratiṣṭhāpitā bhavanti //
K10bsu019_u:575: atha ratnapāṇirbodhisattvo bhagavantametadavocat - katamena kālena bhagavato 'sya dṛḍhapratijñāṃ paripūrayati,
K10bsu019_u:577: bhagavānāha - bahubhiḥ kulaputra kāraṇaiḥ sattvāḥ kāraṇāt saṃsāre saṃsaranti,
K10bsu019_u:602: yathā yathā vaineyānāṃ sattvānāṃ tathā tathā (Vaidya 269)
K10bsu019_u:604: evaṃ kulaputra avalokiteśvaro bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ sattvān dharmaṃ deśayati,
K10bsu019_u:610: atha ratnapāṇirbodhisattvo mahāsattvo bhagavantametadavocat - paramāścaryādbhutaprāpto 'haṃ bhagavan /
K10bsu019_u:611: na ca me kadācidasmābhirīdṛśo viṣayo dṛṣṭo vā śruto vā,
K10bsu019_u:614: bhagavānāha - asti kulaputra asminneva jambudvīpe vajrakukṣirnāma guhā /
K10bsu019_u:616: tatra kulaputra avalokiteśvaro bodhisattvo 'surarūpeṇāsurāṇāṃ dharmaṃ deśayati /
K10bsu019_u:618: dharmaśravaṇāyāgatānasurānevaṃ ca kathayati sma - asurāṇāṃ dharmaṃ śṛṇvantu bhavantaḥ /
K10bsu019_u:619: ye cānye 'suraparṣadaste maitracittāḥ śāntacittāḥ dayācittāḥ sattvānāmantike hitasukhacittā bhāvaṃ samanvāhṛtya imaṃ kāraṇḍavyūhaṃ dharmaparyāyaṃ śrotavyam //
K10bsu019_u:620: atha te 'surāḥ kṛtakarapuṭā avalokiteśvarasyāntikamimaṃ dharmaparyāyaṃ śṛṇvanti sma /
K10bsu019_u:621: te sukhitā loke ye īdṛśaṃ cintāmaṇisadṛśaṃ kāraṇḍavyūhaṃ mahāyānasūtraratnarājamabhimukhīkurvanti,
K10bsu019_u:638: te ca sarve tathāgatā āśvāsayiṣyanti - mā bhaiṣīḥ kulaputra,
K10bsu019_u:641: tatra sukhāvatyāṃ lokadhātau tavārthe vicitraṃ ca te chatraṃ sihāsanaṃ sajjīkṛtam,
K10bsu019_u:644: evaṃ sa ratnapāṇe prativiśiṣṭataraṃ puṇyaphalaṃ darśayannavalokiteśvaro bodhisattvo mahāsattvo nirvāṇikīṃ bhūmimupadarśayati sma /
K10bsu019_u:646: atha ratnapāṇirbodhisattvo mahāsattvo bhagavataḥ pādau śirasābhivandya tatraiva prakrāntaḥ //
K10bsu019_u:650: athe sarvanīvaraṇaviṣkambhī bhagavantametadavocat - atidurlabhaṃ bhagavan asyāvalokiteśvarasya vikurvitāni śrūyante guṇodbhāvanāni ca /
K10bsu019_u:656: tadapi samatikramya viśvabhūrnāma tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddho babhūva vidyācaraṇasaṃpannaḥ
K10bsu019_u:657: sugato lokavidanuttaraḥ puruṣadamyasārathiḥ śāstā devānāṃ ca manuṣyāṇāṃ ca buddho bhagavān /
K10bsu019_u:658: tena kālena tena samayena ahaṃ sarvanīvaraṇaviṣkambhī bodhisattvaḥ kṣāntivādī ṛṣirabhūt girigahvarāntarakarvaṭasthānavāsī,
K10bsu019_u:660: tadā kālānukālaṃ mayā tasya viśvabhuvaḥ tathāgatasya sakāśāt guṇodbhāvanā avalokiteśvarasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya śrutā vividhasarvasattvaparipācanam
K10bsu019_u:661: asti sarvanīvaraṇaviṣkambhin sā kāñcanamayī nāma bhūmirasti yaduttarasyāṃ kāñcanamayyāṃ
K10bsu019_u:662: bhūmyāṃ gatvā avalokiteśvaro bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'dhomukhānāṃ sattvānāṃ dharmaṃ deśayati sma /
K10bsu019_u:664: sa tataḥ kāñcanamayyā bhūmyā niṣkramitvā rūpyamayyāṃ bhūmyāṃ praviśati /
K10bsu019_u:665: tatra sa paśyati catuṣpādikāni sattvāni puruṣapudgalāni /
K10bsu019_u:666: dṛṣṭvā teṣāmavalokiteśvaro bodhisattvo mahāsattvo sarvasattvānāmeva dharmaṃ deśayati
K10bsu019_u:667: - śṛṇvantu bhavantaḥ sarve puruṣapudgalā abhimukhaṃ dharmaparyāyaṃ pracalamānasucetasā nirvāṇikam /
K10bsu019_u:669: athe te sarve puruṣā avalokiteśvarasya purataḥ sthitvā etadavocat - āśvāsaya tvam /
K10bsu019_u:672: aśaraṇānāṃ sattvānāṃ śaraṇaṃ parāyaṇaṃ mātāpitṛbhūto bhava /
K10bsu019_u:675: sukhitāste sattvā ye tava satataṃ parigrahaṃ nāmamanusmaranti,
K10bsu019_u:677: idaṃ ca samāgāḍhataraṃ duḥkhaṃ na kadācitpratyanubhavanti,
K10bsu019_u:678: muñcanti te hīdṛśaṃ duḥkhaṃ yāvadyādṛśaṃ vayaṃ pratyanubhavāmaḥ //
K10bsu019_u:679: atha sa teṣāṃ sattvānāṃ kāraṇḍavyūhaṃ nama mahāyanasūtraratnarājaṃ karṇapuṭe niścārayati sma /
K10bsu019_u:680: te ca sattvā amuṃ dharmaparyāyaṃ śrutvā anyonyavihitaśrotṛkarṇapuṭā niścaranti sma /
K10bsu019_u:681: tadapi te puruṣāḥ śrutvā avaivartikabhūminiṣpāditāḥ paramasukhasamarpitāḥ saṃskṛtāḥ //
K10bsu019_u:682: atha āryāvalokiteśvaro bodhisattvo mahāsattvastasyā rūpamayyā niṣkramyānyatarāyāṃ
K10bsu019_u:683: bhūmyāṃ praviśati sattvaparipākāya mahākaruṇāsaṃpīḍitahṛdayo 'yomayyāṃ bhūmyāṃ yatra
K10bsu019_u:686: upasaṃkramya ca rājño balerasurendrasya dūrataścakṣurdarśanaṃ yāti sma suvarṇabimbamiva raśmibhiḥ pramuñcamānairnānāvarṇaiḥ //
K10bsu019_u:690: atha sa rājā balirasurendro 'valokiteśvaraṃ bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvaṃ dūrata evāgacchantaṃ paśyati sma /
K10bsu019_u:692: sahasraparivārairgatvā avalokiteśvarasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya pādayornipatyedamudānayati sma -
K10bsu019_u:694: adya me saphalaṃ janma jīvitaṃ puṇyameva ca /
K10bsu019_u:695: adya me hīdṛśaṃ caiva paripūrṇaṃ manoratham // Kvyu_1,11.1 //
K10bsu019_u:696: adya me āśayaḥ pūrṇaḥ pariśuddhaśca duḥkhataḥ /
K10bsu019_u:697: yanmayā darśane samyag dṛṣṭvā lokaikabāndhavaḥ // Kvyu_1,11.2 //
K10bsu019_u:698: tadā me sarvasaukhyaṃ ca kāme saṃtiṣṭhate punaḥ /
K10bsu019_u:699: saukhyā bhavanti te sattvā sarvaduḥkhavivarjitāḥ // Kvyu_1,11.3 //
K10bsu019_u:703: atha sa rājā balistasya bhagavato 'valokiteśvarasya pādayoḥ praṇipatya ratnapīṭhakaṃ dattvā daśanakhāñjaliṃ kṛtvaivamāha -
K10bsu019_u:707: pāparatānāṃ jātyandhabhūtānāṃ paradāragamanaprasaktānāṃ prāṇātipātodyuktānāṃ paraprāṇāhiṃsakānāṃ jarāmaraṇabhayabhītānāmudvignamānasānāṃ saṃsāraduṣṭavārtānāṃ trātā bhava /
K10bsu019_u:711: eṣāmasmākaṃ bandhanabaddhānāṃ tava darśanena sarvabandhanādayaḥ parimuktāḥ,
K10bsu019_u:713: tvaddarśanamātreṇa yāni tāni rājñaścakravartinaśca śubhakarmajātāni cakravartisukhāni mama saṃvidyante,
K10bsu019_u:716: na ca punarimāni yāni sarvabandhanāni cakṣuṣu ābhāsamāgaccheyuḥ //
K10bsu019_u:717: atha āryāvalokiteśvaro bodhisattvo mahāsattvo rājānaṃ balimasurendramevamāha - ye mahārāja sattvānāmantike avihiṃsācittamutpādayanti,
K10bsu019_u:720: na ca teṣāṃ kecitsattvāḥ svapnenāpi pīḍayanti /
K10bsu019_u:726: teṣāṃ ca dharmabhāṇakānāmasya dharmaparyāyasya dhārakānāṃ vācakānāṃ lekhakānāṃ saṃśrāvakāṇām,
K10bsu019_u:727: asya ca tathāgatasya dharmaparyāyamuddiśya ekadivasamapi purobhaktamapi piṇḍapātramanupradāsyati,
K10bsu019_u:734: tasya ca bhagavato 'mitābhasya tathāgatasya purataḥ saṃmukhaṃ dharmaṃ śrutvā vyākaraṇamanuprāpsyanti /
K10bsu019_u:737: tadyathāpi nāma kulaputra ye tathāgatasyārhataḥ samyaksaṃbuddhasya tiṣṭhataḥ parinirvṛtasya vā piṇḍapātramanuprayacchanti,
K10bsu019_u:740: dvādaśagaṅgānadīvālukopamā mama sadṛśā bodhisattvā mahāsattvā bhaveyuḥ,
K10bsu019_u:742: te 'pi sarve samagrībhūtā na śakyante ekasya piṇḍaprātrapradānasya kuśalamūlasaṃbhārasya puṇyaskandhaṃ gaṇayitum /
K10bsu019_u:744: tadyathāpi nāma kulaputra śakyate mayā paramāṇurajasāṃ pramāṇamudgrahītum /
K10bsu019_u:745: na tu kulaputra śakyaṃ mayā piṇḍapātrasya puṇyaskandhaṃ gaṇayitum /
K10bsu019_u:746: tadyathāpi nama kulaputra caturṣu mahādvīpeṣu strīpuruṣadārakadārikādayaste sarve kṛṣikarmānte udyuktā bhaveyuḥ /
K10bsu019_u:751: sarve te strīpuruṣadārakadārikādayaḥ śakaṭairbhārairmuṭaiḥ pīṭhakairuṣṭrairgobhirgardabhaiḥ sarve te mardayitvā tasmin mahākhalake mahāntaṃ rāśiṃ kuryāt /
K10bsu019_u:754: na tu kulaputra śakyate piṇḍapātrasya puṇyaskandhaṃ gaṇayitum /
K10bsu019_u:755: tadyathāpi nāma kulaputra sumeruḥ parvatarājaḥ caturaśītiyojanasahasrāṇi adhastādupagataḥ ūrdhveṇa caturaśītiyojanasahasrāṇyucchrayeṇa ca /
K10bsu019_u:758: ye caturdvīpanivāsinaḥ puruṣadārakadārikāste ca sarve lekhakā bhaveyuḥ /
K10bsu019_u:761: na tu kulaputra śakyate piṇḍapātrasya puṇyaskandhaṃ gaṇayitum /
K10bsu019_u:762: tadyathāpi nāma kulaputra lekhakāḥ sarve te daśabhūmipratiṣṭhitā bodhisattvā bhaveyuḥ paryāpannāḥ /
K10bsu019_u:763: yacca teṣāṃ daśabhūmipratiṣṭhitānāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ puṇyaskandhaṃ tamekasya piṇḍapātrasya puṇyaskandhaṃ gaṇayitum /
K10bsu019_u:764: tadyathāpi nāma kulaputra gaṅgāyā nadyā vālukāsamudrasya ca śakyaṃ mayā ekaikaṃ vālukāṃ gaṇayitum,
K10bsu019_u:765: na tu kulaputra śakyate mayā piṇḍapātrasya puṇyaskandhaṃ gaṇayitum /
K10bsu019_u:766: tadyathāpi nāma kulaputra śakyate mayā sarvamaturāsrāṃ(?)
K10bsu019_u:768: na śakyaṃ mayā kulaputra piṇḍapātrasya puṇyaskandhaṃ gaṇayitum //
K10bsu019_u:769: atha balisurendraḥ idaṃ ca tasya bhagavato 'valokiteśvarasyāntikātpiṇḍapātrakuśalabhūtasya
K10bsu019_u:771: gadgadakaṇṭhaḥ bāṣpaparipūrṇa ucchvasan avalokiteśvaraṃ bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvametadavocat
K10bsu019_u:772: - kīdṛśaṃ mayā bhagavan balinā karma kṛtaṃ dānaṃ dattam,
K10bsu019_u:774: sāntaḥ - puraparivāreṇa kukṣetre mayā dānaṃ dattam /
K10bsu019_u:778: yadā mayā ca bhagavan tairthikadṛṣṭiparyāpannena mānagrastamānasena ca yajñaṃ yajatā mahādānasamucchrayaṃ kartumārabdham,
K10bsu019_u:779: tadā me tatra yajñe vāmanakarūpeṇa yācanako hiṃsraḥ samāgataḥ /
K10bsu019_u:780: tasya me maulīkuṇḍalasragdāmāni ratnābharaṇāni hyaśvarathādīni muktvā ratnakavacāni marakatapralambitāni (Vaidya 273)
K10bsu019_u:781: cāmarapralambitāni muktāhārāṇi muktikājālapralambitāni muktikājālapraticchannāni muktikākalāpajālāṅgulīkāni sauvarṇaghaṇṭikārūpyanibaddhāni raṇaraṇāyamānāni, (anyāni ca)
K10bsu019_u:782: kapilāsahasrāṇi rūpyapādāni sauvarṇaśṛṅgāni muktājālapralambitāni muktikājālapraticchannāni arghapātrasamāyuktāni nānāvicitraghaṇṭāratnasamāyuktāni,
K10bsu019_u:784: kumārīṇāṃ śatasahasrāṇi paramayā gurvaruṇapuṣkalatayā samanvāgatānāṃ nānāvicitrāṇāṃ
K10bsu019_u:793: anekāni suvarṇarūpyamayāni daṇḍāni ratnasaṃyuktāni satataṃ vyavasthāpitāni /
K10bsu019_u:797: tasmin sa mayā rājñā śatasahasrān saṃnipatitān brāhmaṇaśatasahasraṃ saṃnipatitam /
K10bsu019_u:799: tadāhaṃ bhagavan evaṃ sthānasthitānāṃ yathāsaṃnipatitānāṃ dṛṣṭvā vismayamāpannaḥ /
K10bsu019_u:802: etatpaurvikaṃ pāpaṃ pratideśayāmi - kṣātriyabhāryāṇāṃ gurviṇīnāṃ yāvaddhṛdayaṃ sphuṭayitvā kumārakumārikā jīvitādvayaparopitāḥ /
K10bsu019_u:803: tataste ca mahākṣatriyāḥ sarve mayā haḍanigaḍabandhanairbaddhāḥ /
K10bsu019_u:804: nītvā tāmraguhāyāmanekāni kṣatriyaśatasahasrāṇi pañcabandhanabaddhāni kṛtvā sthāpitāni pañcapāṇḍavaprabhṛtīni /
K10bsu019_u:805: tasyāmeva yakṣaguhāyāmupayamāni kīlakāni śṛṅkhalāsamāyuktāni teṣāṃ kṣatriyāṇāṃ hastapādāni baddhvā sthāpitāni /
K10bsu019_u:815: ekaikadvāre pañca pañca śatāni kapāṭāni yantrasamāyuktāni /
K10bsu019_u:823: rūpaṃ kṛtvā dine dine mṛgapakṣyādinā nānājanturūpeṇa /
K10bsu019_u:826: tadātra me daśarathaputreṇāvatāraprekṣiṇā gatvā tena dvārasthāpitāḥ sapta parvatā utpāṭitāḥ /
K10bsu019_u:827: utpāṭayitvā laghunīvānyapradeśe chorayitvā uccaiḥśabdena teṣāṃ kṣatriyāṇāmārocayati (Vaidya 274)
K10bsu019_u:829: anye rājānaḥ śabdamanuśrutaṃ śrutvā samāśvāsya svasthakāyā vyavasthitāḥ /
K10bsu019_u:830: sa ca tānevamāha - jīvanto yuṣmākamathavā mṛtāḥ?
K10bsu019_u:832: tena mahāvīryeṇa puruṣeṇa sarvāṇi tāni dvārāṇi bhagnāni /
K10bsu019_u:835: dṛṣṭvā ca nārāyaṇaṃ sarve te parasparaṃ vicintayanti - atha balirasurendro mṛtaḥ kālagataḥ?
K10bsu019_u:837: atha te kathayanti - varamasmākaṃ saṃgrāmabhūmīmaraṇaṃ na tu bandhanabaddhānāṃ maraṇam /
K10bsu019_u:842: atha te rājānaḥ sarve svakaṃ svakaṃ gṛhaṃ gatāḥ /
K10bsu019_u:844: yadā te rathaṃ sajjīkurvanti mahārhāṇi śastrāṇi,
K10bsu019_u:845: tadā daśarathaputreṇa vāmanakarūpamabhinirmāya mṛgājinenottarya veṇudaṇḍamupagṛhya pīṭhikāmupagṛhya saṃprasthito matsakāśam /
K10bsu019_u:847: dvārapālairanubaddhaḥ - mā praviśa vāmanaka brāhmaṇa iti /
K10bsu019_u:852: atha sa dvārapālapuruṣo gatvā balimārocayati - deva,
K10bsu019_u:854: atha sa balistametadavocat - kīdṛśaṃ vastu yācate?
K10bsu019_u:855: atha sa dvārapālastametadavocat - deva na tamanujānāmi /
K10bsu019_u:866: śukra uvāca - jānāmyahaṃ tasya nimittāni cihnāni ca dṛṣṭvā /
K10bsu019_u:868: atha nārāyaṇena vicintya avaśyaṃ dānasya vipratisāraṃ bhaviṣyati /
K10bsu019_u:873: baliruvāca - yadi tvaṃ brāhmaṇa dvipadaṃ yācase,
K10bsu019_u:875: sa pratigrahaṃ tasyopagṛhya svastimupavadyānugṛhītaṃ tena tilapānīyasuvarṇasahitam /
K10bsu019_u:877: atha śukro balimetadavocat - rājan kathitaṃ mayā kālapuruṣa eṣa praviṣṭaḥ /
K10bsu019_u:878: na ca tvayā pramāṇaṃ kṛtaṃ vacanam /
K10bsu019_u:883: atha balirasurendro 'dhomukhaṃ prapatitaḥ smṛtibhraṣṭaḥ tharatharāyamānaḥ sthitaḥ /
K10bsu019_u:884: kiṃ kṛtya(?) svahastena mayā viṣaṃ bhakṣitam /
K10bsu019_u:887: tadā sa kathayati - tṛtīyasya padaṃ na saṃvidyate /
K10bsu019_u:890: atha nārāyaṇastametadavocat - yatrāhaṃ sthāpayāmi tatra tvayā sthātavyam /
K10bsu019_u:891: (Vaidya 275) atha sa balirasurendrastametadavocat - yādṛśaṃ tvayājñaptaṃ tādṛśaṃ karomyaham /
K10bsu019_u:897: tā api ca kumārikāḥ pāṇḍavaiḥ kauravairvidhvaṃsitāḥ /
K10bsu019_u:898: tāni ca suvarṇamayāni siṃhāsanāni divyāni cchatrāṇyupānahāni ratnapariveṣṭitāni ca
K10bsu019_u:899: vastrābharaṇāni ca suvarṇaghaṇṭāni suvarṇakaṭakāni ratnakhacitāni kapilāni kauravapāṇḍavairvidhvaṃsitāni /
K10bsu019_u:901: atha sa balirasurendro yajñabhūmerniṣkrāntaḥ śarīracintāmāpede - dātā balirudārayajñamupāsya /
K10bsu019_u:904: yathaiva kartā sartā sa nītvā pātālamupasthāpitaḥ sāntaḥpuraparivāraḥ /
K10bsu019_u:905: ākhyātaṃ hi mayā bhagavan - bhūtapūrvaṃ kurukṣetre mayā dānaṃ dattaṃ tasyaitatkarmaphalamanubhavāmi /
K10bsu019_u:908: atha balistaṃ bhagavantamāryāvalokiteśvaraṃ bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvaṃ stotraviśeṣaiḥ stotumārabdhaḥ - trāṇaṃ bhavāhi śubhapadmahasta /
K10bsu019_u:930: mucyante te kārasūtrai rauravopapanneṣu avīcyupapanneṣu pretanagaropapanneṣu ye tava nāmadheyamanusmaranti /
K10bsu019_u:935: atha āryāvalokiteśvaro balerindrasya vyākaraṇamanuprayacchati sma - bhaviṣyasi tvamasurendra
K10bsu019_u:936: śrīrnāma tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddho vidyācaraṇasaṃpannaḥ sugato lokavidanuttaraḥ
K10bsu019_u:937: puruṣadamyasārathiḥ śāstā devānāṃ ca manuṣyāṇāṃ ca buddho bhagavān /
K10bsu019_u:939: tatra tava buddhakṣetre na rāgaśabdo na dveṣaśabdo na mohaśabdo bhaviṣyati /
K10bsu019_u:942: śatasahasramūlyaṃ muktāhāramupanāmitaṃ maulīkuṇḍalaṃ ca nānāratnasamuccitamupanāmitaṃ ca //
K10bsu019_u:943: atha āryāvalokiteśvaro dharmadeśanāṃ kartumārabdhaḥ - śṛṇu mahārāja /
K10bsu019_u:944: nitye dhruve śāśvate mānuṣyake ye cintayanti satataparigrahaṃ mahābhogānyanuvicintayanti dāsīdāsakarmakarapauruṣeyān,
K10bsu019_u:947: ajñānāste sattvā ye putradāradārikāmanuvicintayanti bhāryāṃ mātāpitarau /
K10bsu019_u:953: ye ca mahārhā vṛkṣāstān pradīptān saprajvalitānekajvālībhūtān paśyanti /
K10bsu019_u:956: tvaritaṃ tvaritaṃ kṣuradhāropacite mahāpathe pādā viśīryante /
K10bsu019_u:960: tataḥ kṣuradhāropacitānmahāpathādavatīrya yatra ṣoḍaśāṅgulipramāṇāni kaṇṭakāni tatrānīyate,
K10bsu019_u:961: tata ekaikapāde pañca pañcaśatāni kaṇṭakāni praviśanti /
K10bsu019_u:962: sa cākrandanti - viṣayapāparatena sattvena karma kṛtam //
K10bsu019_u:967: na ca tvayā kvaciddānāni dīyamānāni dṛṣṭvānumoditāni /
K10bsu019_u:968: na ca tvayā kvacit pradeśe stūpabimbāni pradakṣiṇīkṛtāni /
K10bsu019_u:969: sa kathayati - aśrāddho 'bhūvaṃ pāparato buddhadharmasaṃghaparivarjitaḥ pāpamitraparigṛhītaḥ kalyāṇamitraparivarjitaśca /
K10bsu019_u:972: athe te yamapuruṣā nītvā kālasūtre mahānarake kṣipanti /
K10bsu019_u:973: śikṣā caikaikaśaktiśataṃ kāye vidhyanti tadapi jīvati,
K10bsu019_u:974: dvitīyaṃ śaktiśataṃ kāye vidhyanti tadapi jīvati,
K10bsu019_u:975: tṛtīyaṃ śaktiśataṃ kāye vidhyanti tadapi jīvati /
K10bsu019_u:976: yadā kalaṃ na kurvanti tadāgnikhadāmadhye kṣipanti /
K10bsu019_u:981: kaṇṭhamapi tālumapi hṛdayamapi yantravatkalā nigaḍāyamānā sarvaṃ taṃ kāyaṃ dahyante /
K10bsu019_u:982: evameva hā rājan na kaścit trātā bhaviṣyati paraloke /
K10bsu019_u:983: tasmāttarhi taṃ mahārāja yatnena puṇyaṃ kartavyam /
K10bsu019_u:984: evaṃ sānulomikīṃ dharmadeśanāṃ kṛtvā ca taṃ rājānaṃ balimasurendramevamāha - apramattena bhavitavyam,
K10bsu019_u:990: mamāntikāddharmadeśanāṃ śṛṇvato niravaśeṣāṇi pāpaskandhāni na ca supariśuddhāni /
K10bsu019_u:993: tatra ca tava saptaratnamayaṃ padmāsanaṃ prādurbhūtaṃ bhaviṣyati /
K10bsu019_u:994: yatra ratnapadme niṣadya tasya bhagavato 'mitābhasya tathāgatasyārhataḥ samyaksaṃbuddhasyāntikāt
K10bsu019_u:997: śrutvā ca tatraiva vyākaraṇamanuprāpsyase anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau,
K10bsu019_u:1001: atha āryāvalokiteśvaro bodhisattvo mahāsattvastasya ca balerasurendrasya imaṃ sarvadurgatipariśodhanaṃ
K10bsu019_u:1002: bodhisattvālaṃkārakāraṇḍavyūhaṃ nāma dharmālokaṃ deśayitvā taṃ rājānaṃ balimasurendraṃ
K10bsu019_u:1011: tadā te devā nāgā yakṣā rākṣasā asurā garuḍāḥ kinnarā mahoragā manuṣyāḥ saṃnipatitāḥ /
K10bsu019_u:1013: atha teṣāṃ bodhisattvenāṃ madhye gaganagañjo nāma bodhisattva utthāyāsanādekāṃsamuttarāsaṅgaṃ
K10bsu019_u:1014: kṛtvā dakṣiṇaṃ jānumaṇḍalaṃ pṛthivyāṃ pratiṣṭhāpya yena bhagavāṃstenāñjaliṃ praṇamya
K10bsu019_u:1016: bhagavānāha - eṣa kulaputra avalokiteśvaro bodhisattvo mahāsattvo balerasurendrasya bhavane viharati,
K10bsu019_u:1020: atha gaganagañjo bodhisattvo mahāsattvo bhagavantametadavocat - kenopāyena paśyeyamahamavalokiteśvaraṃ bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvam?
K10bsu019_u:1022: yadā avalokiteśvaro bodhisattvo mahāsattvo balerasurendrasya bhavanānniṣkrāntaḥ,
K10bsu019_u:1023: tadā jetavane mahāvihāre divyāni puṣpavarṣāṇi patanti,
K10bsu019_u:1028: lohitadaṇḍāni suvarṇarūpyapatrāṇi anekāni puṣpavṛkṣaśatāni anekāni puṣkariṇīśatāni puṣpaparipūrṇāni paramaśobhanīyāni prādurbhūtāni //
K10bsu019_u:1029: atha gaganagañjo bodhisattvo mahāsattvo bhagavantametadavocat - nāgacchati bhagavannavalokiteśvaro bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ?
K10bsu019_u:1030: bhagavānāha - eṣa kulaputra tato balerasurendrasya bhavanānniṣkamya paramabhīṣaṇīyaṃ
K10bsu019_u:1031: tamondhakāraṃ nāma pṛthivīpradeśaṃ yakṣarākṣasānāṃ bhūmiṃ amanuṣyāvacaramapṛthivīpradeśaṃ tatra gacchati /
K10bsu019_u:1033: tatra ca pṛthivīpradeśe varado nāma cintāmaṇiratnarājo 'sti /
K10bsu019_u:1040: dhāvitvā pādayoḥ praṇipatya saṃbhāṣayanti - mā tvaṃ bhagavan śrāntaklānto yastvaṃ cirakālena dṛṣṭaḥ,
K10bsu019_u:1045: atha te sarve yakṣarākṣasā divyasuvarṇaratnamayaṃ siṃhāsanaṃ prasamayanti tasyāvalokiteśvarasyārthe vicitraiḥ puṣpamayaiḥ saṃchāditam,
K10bsu019_u:1047: sa tairyakṣarākṣasairnītvā tatra divyasuvarṇaratnamaye siṃhāsane viśrāmitaḥ /
K10bsu019_u:1048: tataḥ avalokiteśvarasteṣāṃ yakṣarākṣasānāṃ dharma deśayati - śṛṇvattu bhavantaḥ /
K10bsu019_u:1049: āryakāraṇḍavyūhasya mahāyānasūtraratnarājasya catuṣpādikāmapi gāthāṃ ye śroṣyanti,
K10bsu019_u:1053: tadyathāpi nāma kulaputrāḥ śakyaṃ mayā paramāṇurajasāṃ pramāṇamudgrahītum,
K10bsu019_u:1054: na tu kulaputrāḥ śakyaṃ mayā kāraṇḍavyūhasya mahāyānasūtraratnarājasya puṇyaskandhaṃ gaṇayitum /
K10bsu019_u:1055: tadyathāpi nāma kulaputrāḥ śakyaṃ mayā mahāsamudrasyaikamudakabinduṃ gaṇayitum,
K10bsu019_u:1056: na tu kulaputrāḥ śakyaṃ mayā kāraṇḍavyūhasya mahāyānasūtraratnarājasya catuṣpādikāyā api gāthāyāḥ puṇyaskandhaṃ gaṇayitum /
K10bsu019_u:1057: tadyathāpi nāma kulaputrāḥ dvādaśagaṅgānadīvālukopamāstathāgatā arhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhādvādaśakalpānekasthāne dhārayeyuḥ,
K10bsu019_u:1059: te 'pi tathāgatāḥ sarve sahitā bhūtvā kāraṇḍavyūhasya mahāyānasūtraratnarājasya catuṣpādikāyā api gāthāyāḥ puṇyaskandhaṃ gaṇayituṃ na śaknuvanti
K10bsu019_u:1061: tadyathāpi nāma kulaputrāścaturmahādvīpeṣvekaikadvīpapramāṇaṃ gṛhaṃ vihāraṃ vā kārayeddivyasuvarṇaratnamayam,
K10bsu019_u:1062: tatra gṛhe vihāre vā stūpasahasraṃ kuryāt,
K10bsu019_u:1065: tato bahutaraṃ kāraṇḍavyūhasya mahāyānasūtraratnarājasya catuṣpādikāyā api gāthāyāḥ puṇyaskandham /
K10bsu019_u:1066: tadyathāpi nāma kulaputrāḥ pañca mahānadyo sahasranadīparivārā mahāsamudramupasaṃkrāmanti,
K10bsu019_u:1067: evameva kulaputrā asya kāraṇḍavyūhamahāyānasūtraratnarājasya catuṣpādikāmapi gāthāṃ śṛṇvatāṃ puṇyaughapravāhamupapravahati //
K10bsu019_u:1068: atha te yakṣarākṣasā avalokiteśvarametadavocan - ye sattvāḥ kāraṇḍavyūhaṃ mahāyānasūtraratnarājaṃ likhāpayiṣyanti,
K10bsu019_u:1070: sa āha - aprameyaṃ teṣāṃ kulaputrāḥ puṇyaskandhaṃ prabhavati /
K10bsu019_u:1075: te sahasraṃ putrāṇāṃ śūrāṇāṃ vīrāṇāṃ varāṅgarūpiṇāṃ parasainyapramardakānāṃ janayanti /
K10bsu019_u:1080: tatra tatra jātau jātau jātismarā bhavanti /
K10bsu019_u:1085: na kadācit yakṣatvaṃ na rākṣasatvaṃ na pretatvaṃ na piśācatvaṃ na pūtanātvaṃ na kaṭapūtanātvaṃ na manuṣyadāridryaṃ pratyanubhaviṣyanti /
K10bsu019_u:1086: gaṅgānadīvālukāsamānāṃ buddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ sevāpuṇyaskandhena samanvāgatā bhaviṣyanti /
K10bsu019_u:1087: ye 'pi kecit kulaputrāḥ sattvā asmāt kāraṇḍavyūhamahāyānasūtraratnarājādekākṣaramapi nāmadheyamapi catuṣpādikāmapi gāthāṃ likhāpayiṣyanti,
K10bsu019_u:1088: teṣāṃ pañcānantaryāṇi karmāṇi niravaśeṣaṃ parikṣayaṃ gamiṣyanti /
K10bsu019_u:1093: teṣāṃ na kaścit kāye vyādhiḥ prabhaviṣyati /
K10bsu019_u:1094: na cakṣurogaṃ na śrotrarogaṃ na ghrāṇarogaṃ na jihvārogaṃ na kāyarogam /
K10bsu019_u:1097: na mleccheṣu na pāpakuleṣu norabhrikeṣu na kaukkuṭikeṣu na jatyeṣu(?)
K10bsu019_u:1100: atha āryāvalokiteśvaro bodhisattvo mahāsattva evaṃ teṣāṃ yakṣarākṣasānāṃ tamondhakāravāsināṃ sarveṣāṃ cānulomikāṃ dharmadeśanāṃ kṛtavān /
K10bsu019_u:1101: te yakṣarākṣasāstāṃ dharmadeśanāṃ śubhāṃ śrutvā kecit srotaāpattiphale pratiṣṭhitāḥ /
K10bsu019_u:1106: ato yenāryāvalokiteśvaro bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ tenopasaṃkramya pādayoḥ praṇipatya evaṃ kathayanti - ihaiva bhagavan viharasva,
K10bsu019_u:1109: vayaṃ ca tavāntike asminneva tamondhakārabhūmau tavārthāya divyāni sauvarṇamayāni caṃkramaṇāni kariṣyāmaḥ /
K10bsu019_u:1112: atha āryāvalokiteśvaro bodhisattvo mahāsattvastāṃśca yakṣarākṣasānetadavocat - anekāni ca mayā kulaputrāḥ sattvāni bodhimārge niyojayitavyāni
K10bsu019_u:1113: atha te sarve yakṣarākṣasāḥ kare kapolaṃ dattvā cintāparā vyavasthitāḥ /
K10bsu019_u:1114: te parasparamevamāhuḥ - gamiṣyati ayamasmākamavalokiteśvaro bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'nyataraṃ pṛthivīpradeśam,
K10bsu019_u:1117: atha āryāvalokiteśvaro bodhisattvo mahāsattvastasyāstamondhakārāyā bhūmyāḥ saṃprasthitaḥ /
K10bsu019_u:1118: atha te tamondhakāraprativāsino yakṣarākṣasāstasya bhagavato 'valokiteśvarasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya pṛṣṭhataḥ pṛṣṭhataḥ samanubaddhā gacchanti sma /
K10bsu019_u:1121: te yakṣarākṣasāḥ pādau śirasā vanditvā triḥpradakṣiṇīkṛtya tatraiva ca prakrāntāḥ //
K10bsu019_u:1129: tatra devanikāyeṣu sukuṇḍalo nāma devaputro daridro duścittaśceti /
K10bsu019_u:1130: atha āryāvalokiteśvaraḥ sa tena brāhmaṇarūpeṇa tasya devaputrasya sakāśamupasaṃkrāntaḥ /
K10bsu019_u:1131: upasaṃkramya sarveṣāṃ devānāṃ dāridryaduḥkhavyupaśamāya taṃ devaputrametadavocat - bubhukṣito 'haṃ tṛṣitaśceti /
K10bsu019_u:1132: atha sa devaputro rudaṃstaṃ brāhmaṇametadavocat - na ca me brāhmaṇa kiṃcitsaṃvidyate /
K10bsu019_u:1134: atha sa devaputro vimānaṃ praviśya sarvabhāṇḍaṃ nirabhyavekṣitumārabdhaḥ /
K10bsu019_u:1135: sa ca paripatitaṃ niveśanaṃ divyairmahārhai ratnabhāṇḍaiḥ paripūrṇaṃ dakṣiṇapārśvam,
K10bsu019_u:1136: anyāni ca bhāṇḍāni divyarasarasāgropetairāhāraiḥ paripūrṇāni vāmapārśve vimānasya vastrābharaṇaiḥ sarvapuṣpagandhādibhiḥ paripūrṇāni //
K10bsu019_u:1137: atha sa devaputra etad dṛṣṭaivaṃ cintāmāpede - avaśyamayaṃ sa satpātro dvāre sthito yasya darśanamātreṇāpidṛśī lakṣmīrmamānuprāptā /
K10bsu019_u:1138: atha sa devaputrastaṃ brāhmaṇamāhūyaivamāha - ehi brāhmaṇa,
K10bsu019_u:1140: sa ca brāhmaṇastena devaputreṇa vimāne praviśya tairdivyaratnaiḥ pratipāditaḥ,
K10bsu019_u:1144: atha sa devaputrastaṃ brāhmaṇametadavocat - bho brāhmaṇa,
K10bsu019_u:1147: atha sa devaputrastametadavocat - kīdṛśī sā bhūmiḥ?
K10bsu019_u:1148: atha sa brāhmaṇo devaputrametadavocat - tathāgatādhyuṣitā sā bhūmī ramaṇīyā divyamaṇiratnaparikhacitā pariśobhitā /
K10bsu019_u:1152: vividhāśca śīlavanto guṇavanto dakṣiṇīyā dṛśyante viśvabhuvaḥ /
K10bsu019_u:1155: atha sa devaputrastaṃ brāhmaṇametadavocat - avaśyaṃ tvayā brāhmaṇa satyaṃ pratyāhāraḥ kartavyaḥ /
K10bsu019_u:1158: na ca manuṣyasyedṛśaṃ nimittaṃ bhavati yādṛśaṃ tava nimittaṃ bhavati /
K10bsu019_u:1163: upanāmayitvā ca sa devaputra imāṃ gāthāṃ bhāṣita(vān) -
K10bsu019_u:1166: atha sa devaputra imāṃ gāthāṃ bhāṣitvā tatraiva prakrāntaḥ //
K10bsu019_u:1171: atha sa brāhmaṇaḥ tasmāddevanikāyādavatīrya siṃhaladvīpaṃ pratyudgataḥ /
K10bsu019_u:1172: gatvā ca rākṣasīnāṃ purato vyavasthitaḥ kāmarūpamātmānamabhinirmāya prāsādikam /
K10bsu019_u:1173: atha tā rākṣasyo 'nyonyamevamāhuḥ - ayamīdṛśaṃ paramakāmarūpī puruṣo dṛśyate /
K10bsu019_u:1174: atha taṃ dṛṣṭvā ca tadā tāsāṃ rākṣasīnāṃ kāmacittamutpannam /
K10bsu019_u:1175: tadā tasya sakāśamupasaṃkramyaitadavocan - bhavāṃstvaṃ bhajasva asmākaṃ kumārīyauvanam,
K10bsu019_u:1184: imāni te 'nnagṛhāṇi pānagṛhāṇi vastragṛhāṇi vividhāni vicitrāṇi śayanāni udyānaramaṇīyāni puṣkiriṇīramayāṇi //
K10bsu019_u:1187: tāśca tamāhuḥ - kathaṃ vayaṃ tavājñāṃ na kariṣyāmaḥ?
K10bsu019_u:1191: atha tā rākṣasyastasyapuruṣasyāntikādāryāṣṭāṅgikamārgaṃ gṛhītvā daśa kuśalāni ca saṃsmarya,
K10bsu019_u:1198: tadā tāsāṃ rākṣasīnāṃ rāgaduḥkhaṃ na bādhate /
K10bsu019_u:1205: evaṃ cāhuḥ - punarapi na prāṇātipātaṃ kurvāmaḥ /
K10bsu019_u:1206: yādṛśena jāmbudvīpakā manuṣyā jīvanti annena pānena,
K10bsu019_u:1210: tādṛśaṃ śikṣāsaṃvaramupagṛhītvā tasyaiva puruṣasya purato 'nimiṣairnayanaiḥ prekṣamāṇāḥ prasthitāḥ //
K10bsu019_u:1214: atha āryāvalokiteśvaro bodhisattvo mahāsattvastasmātsiṃhaladvīpādavatīrya vārāṇasyāṃ mahānagaryāmuccāraprasrāvasthāne gato yatrānekānyanekāni kṛmikulaśatasahasrāṇi prativasanti /
K10bsu019_u:1215: tato 'valokiteśvaro bodhisattvo mahāsattva upasaṃkramya tatrāsa tāni prāṇiśatasahasrāṇi dṛṣṭvā ātmānaṃ bhramararūpamabhinirmāya ghuṇaghuṇāyamāṇam
K10bsu019_u:1219: tacchrutvā te ca sarve prāṇakāḥ namo buddhāya namo dharmāya namaḥ saṃghāyeti nāmamanusmārayanti /
K10bsu019_u:1220: te ca sarve buddhanāmasmaraṇamātreṇa viṃśatiśikharasamudgataṃ satkāyadṛṣṭiśailaṃ
K10bsu019_u:1221: jñānavajreṇa bhittvā sarve te sukhāvatyāṃ lokadhātāvupapannāḥ sugandhamukhā nāma
K10bsu019_u:1223: sarve te bhagavato 'mitābhasya tathāgatasyāntikādidaṃ kāraṇḍavyūhaṃ nāma mahāyānaṃ śrutvā anumodya ca nānādigbhyo vyākaraṇāni pratilabdhāni
K10bsu019_u:1225: atha āryāvalokiteśvaro bodhisattvo mahāsattvo sattvaparipākaṃ kṛtvā tasyā vārāṇasyā mahānagaryāḥ prakrāntaḥ //
K10bsu019_u:1231: yāvat sattvān paśyanti sma parasparaṃ māṃsabhakṣaṇaṃ kurvāṇān /
K10bsu019_u:1235: viṃśativarṣāṇi paripūrṇāni kāntārasya ca pratipannasya ca /
K10bsu019_u:1239: atha avalokiteśvaro bodhisattvaścintāmāpede - kenopāyenāhaṃ sattvān sarvān sukhopadhānaistasmātkāntārānmahādārūṇādakālamaraṇātparimocayeyaṃ
K10bsu019_u:1243: tadā paścāddivyāni piṣṭakāni rasarasāgropetāni tenāhāreṇa paripūrṇāni /
K10bsu019_u:1244: yadāhāreṇa saṃtarpitā bhavanti tadā dhānyavarṣāṇi patanti,
K10bsu019_u:1246: vividhāni ca vastrābharaṇāni ca pravarṣanti sma /
K10bsu019_u:1247: yadā yadā teṣāṃ sarveṣāṃ sattvānāṃ ke 'pyabhiprāyā bhavanti,
K10bsu019_u:1249: atha te māgadhakāḥ sattvāstadidaṃ vicitraṃ svātmasukhaṃ dṛṣṭvā duḥkhaṃ ca vyupaśāntam,
K10bsu019_u:1253: tatasteṣāṃ puruṣāṇāṃ madhye jīrṇo vṛddho mahallakaḥ kubjo gopāṇasīvakro 'dhibhagno dāṇḍaparāyaṇaḥ anekavarṣaśatasahasrāyuṣikaḥ /
K10bsu019_u:1254: sa teṣāṃ madhye sthitvā kathayati - na yuṣmākamanyadevasya kasyacidīdṛśaṃ prabhāvo bhavati virahitādavalokiteśvarasya /
K10bsu019_u:1255: tatastā parṣadaḥ pṛcchanti - kīdṛśaṃ tasya nimittamavalokiteśvarasya?
K10bsu019_u:1256: atha sa puruṣa āryāvalokiteśvarasya guṇodbhāvanāṃ bhāṣitumārabdhaḥ -
K10bsu019_u:1266: sukhitāste sattvā loke ye tasya nāmamanusmaranti /
K10bsu019_u:1268: sacetanāste puruṣapuṃgavā ye avalokiteśvarasya satataparigrahaṃ puṣpadhūpaṃ niryātayanti /
K10bsu019_u:1272: aśvaratnaṃ hastiratnaṃ maṇiratnaṃ strīratnaṃ gṛhapatiratnaṃ pariṇāyakaratnam /
K10bsu019_u:1277: yatra yatropapadyante tatra tatra parīpūrṇakāyāśca bhavanti /
K10bsu019_u:1281: atha sa jīrṇapurūṣaḥ ānulomikīṃ dharmadeśanāṃ kṛtvā svakaṃ gṛhaṃ niveśanaṃ pratyudgataḥ /
K10bsu019_u:1283: atha sa ākāśe cintāmāpede - viśvabhūstathāgato me cirakālaṃ dṛṣṭaḥ,
K10bsu019_u:1287: atha gaganagañjo bodhisattvo bhagavantametadavocat - katamo 'yaṃ bhagavan bodhisattva āgacchati?
K10bsu019_u:1288: bhagavānāha - eṣa kulaputra avalokiteśvaro bodhisattvo mahāsattva āgacchati /
K10bsu019_u:1290: athāvalokiteśvaro bodhisattvastaṃ bhagavantaṃ triḥ pradakṣiṇīkṛtya vāmapārśve viśrāntaḥ //
K10bsu019_u:1291: atha sa punaḥ śrāntaṃ viditvā bhagavān pṛcchati - śrāntastvaṃ kulaputra /
K10bsu019_u:1293: tana tasya bhūtapūrvaṃ varṇitam - sadā preteṣvavīcyupapanneṣu kālasūtrarauravopapanneṣu hāhe tapane mahānarake,
K10bsu019_u:1297: eṣu mahānarakeṣu ye sattvā upapannāsteṣāṃ ca karmabhūmiḥ sattvānāmaparipākakṛtā kartavyā,
K10bsu019_u:1300: atha gaganagañjo bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ paramavismayamāpannaḥ - na ca me bodhisattvabhūtasya īdṛśaṃ viṣayaṃ dṛṣṭaṃ śruta vā,
K10bsu019_u:1302: athe gaganagañjo bodhisattvo 'valokiteśvarasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya purataḥ sthitvā avalokiteśvaramevamāha - mā tvaṃ śrāntaḥ /
K10bsu019_u:1304: sa āha - na cāhaṃ yuṣmākaṃ madhye śrānto na kliṣṭaḥ /
K10bsu019_u:1305: tau parasparaṃ sāṃkathyaṃ kṛtvā tūṣṇīṃbhāvena vyavasthitau //
K10bsu019_u:1306: atha bhagavān ṣaṭpāramitānirdeśaṃ dharmaṃ deśayitumārabdhaḥ - śṛṇvantu kulaputrāḥ /
K10bsu019_u:1310: imāṃ cānulomikāṃ dharmadeśanāṃ kṛtvā tūṣṇīṃbhāvena vyavasthitaḥ /
K10bsu019_u:1312: te ca bodhisattvāḥ svakasvakeṣu buddhakṣetreṣu prakrāntāḥ //
K10bsu019_u:1313: ayaṃ kāraṇḍavyūhamahāyānasūtraratnarājasya prathamo nirvyūhaḥ sarvakarmaviśodhano 'nuttarabodhimārgapratiṣṭhāpakaḥ samāptaḥ // 1 // _________________________________________________________________
K10bsu019_u:1318: atha sarvanīvaraṇaviṣkambhī bhagavantametadavocat - ākhyāhi bhagavan avalokiteśvarasya bhūtapurvaṃ kṛtamete samādhayaḥ,
K10bsu019_u:1323: atha sarvanīvaraṇaviṣkambhī āha - nirdeśaya bhagavaṃstāni samādhīni sarvasattvānukampayā /
K10bsu019_u:1324: bhagavānāha - tadyathāpi nāma kulaputra ākārakaro nāma samādhiḥ,
K10bsu019_u:1386: ebhiṃ kulaputra avalokiteśvaro bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ samādhibhiḥ samanvāgataḥ /
K10bsu019_u:1392: bhūtapūrvaṃ kulaputra ahaṃ siṃhalarājo nāma bodhisattvabhūto 'bhūvam /
K10bsu019_u:1394: pañcabhirvaṇikputraśataiḥ sārdhaṃ śakaṭairbhārairmūṭaiḥ piṭharairuṣṭrairgobhirgardabhādibhiḥ prabhūtaṃ paṇyamāropya siṃhaladvīpaṃ saṃprasthitaḥ
K10bsu019_u:1397: tadā me karṇadhārā āhuḥ - kathaya kathaya yuṣmākaṃ katamadvīpeṣu gamanāyedṛśā vāyavo vānti?
K10bsu019_u:1400: atha karṇadhāra evamāha - yatkhalu devo jānīyāt - siṃhaladvīpeṣu vāyavo vānti /
K10bsu019_u:1402: tato 'haṃ siṃhaladvīpanivāsinībhī rākṣasībhiḥ saṃprasthito viditvā akālavāyava utsṛṣṭāḥ /
K10bsu019_u:1404: te ca vaṇikpuruṣā udake patitā bāhubalena saṃtartumārabdhāḥ /
K10bsu019_u:1406: tato rākṣasīnāṃ pañca śatāni niṣkrāntāni kilakilāyamānāni /
K10bsu019_u:1409: te ca svakīyāni vastrāṇi śarīre lagnāni gṛhītvā niṣpīḍitumārabdhāḥ /
K10bsu019_u:1410: niṣpīḍayitvā te tasmātsthānādatikramya anyapradeśe mahataścampakavṛkṣasya tale viśrāntāḥ /
K10bsu019_u:1411: viśramitvā parasparaṃ sāṃkathyaṃ kartumārabdhāḥ - ko 'smākamupāyaḥ saṃvidyate?
K10bsu019_u:1414: atha teṣāṃ rākṣasyaḥ puruṣāṇāṃ purataḥ sthitvaivamāhuḥ - svāgatam /
K10bsu019_u:1421: imāni te 'nnagṛhāṇi pānagṛhāṇi yānagṛhāṇi vastragṛhāṇi kaṭakakeyūrāṇāṃ maulikuṇḍalānāṃ gṛhāṇi udyānaramaṇīyāni puṣkiriṇīramaṇīyāni saṃtiṣṭhanti
K10bsu019_u:1422: tābhī rākṣasībhirekaikaṃ puruṣaṃ gṛhītvā svakaṃ svakaṃ niveśanaṃ pratyudgatāḥ /
K10bsu019_u:1424: tayāhaṃ svakīyaṃ niveśanaṃ nītvā divyarasasāgropetenāhāreṇa saṃtarpitaḥ /
K10bsu019_u:1426: sa tu tato mānuṣyakena saukhyena saṃtarpitaḥ /
K10bsu019_u:1430: na kadācitsyānmayā dṛṣṭaṃ vā śrutaṃ vā prajvalitameva ratikarahasanam,
K10bsu019_u:1431: tadaiva mayā tasya pratyāhāraḥ kṛtaḥ - kiṃ kāraṇaṃ tvaṃ hasase?
K10bsu019_u:1434: tadā me tasya pratyāhāraḥ kṛtaḥ - tvaṃ jānāsi rākṣasīti?
K10bsu019_u:1439: anye ca jīvanto anye ca mṛtāḥ /
K10bsu019_u:1444: tadā tasyāstena mohajālā nāma nidrāti sā //
K10bsu019_u:1446: atha sa bodhisattvo rātriprathamayāme samaye tasyā rākṣasyāḥ sakāśādutthāya saṃprasthitaḥ /
K10bsu019_u:1452: atha tasminnāyase nagare mahān yaścampakavṛkṣastatraivāruhya tato mayā teṣāmutkāsanaśabdaḥ kṛtaḥ /
K10bsu019_u:1453: tato me vaṇikpuruṣāḥ kathayanti - yatkhalu mahāsārthavāho jānīyāt - vayaṃ rākṣasībhirāyase nagare prakṣiptāḥ /
K10bsu019_u:1454: tadā dine dine śataṃ puruṣāṇāṃ gṛhītvā bhakṣayanti /
K10bsu019_u:1457: tadāhaṃ campakavṛkṣādavatīrya punareva dakṣiṇāṃ panthalikāṃ gṛhītvā anuvicaran tvarita āgacchāmi sma /
K10bsu019_u:1459: atha ratikaro māmetadavocat - dṛṣṭaste sārthavāha madvacanam?
K10bsu019_u:1460: uktaṃ ca mayā - dṛṣṭaṃ yuṣmākaṃ satyaṃ sāṃkathyakṛtam /
K10bsu019_u:1463: atha sa ratikara etadavocat - asti me mahāsārthavāhopāyam,
K10bsu019_u:1466: atha sa ratikaro māmetadavocat - asti tasminneva dvīpe mahāsamudratīre devabālāho nāmāśvarājo hīnadīnānukampakaḥ /
K10bsu019_u:1468: sarvaśvetānāmauṣadhīṃ bhuktvā suvarṇavālukāsthale āvartanaparivartanasaṃparivartanaṃ kṛtvā śarīraṃ pracchoḍayati,
K10bsu019_u:1472: evaṃ sāṃkathyaṃ kṛtvā sā rākṣasī samīpamupagamya sārdhaṃ śayita eva prativibuddhā /
K10bsu019_u:1475: tadā mayā tasyā mṛṣāvādaṃ pratyāhāraṃ kṛtam /
K10bsu019_u:1479: tataḥ prātaḥ sūryasya cābhyudgamanakālasamaye utthāya teṣāṃ vaṇikpurūṣāṇāmārocayati sma - āgacchantu bhavanto bahirnagarasya gacchāmaḥ /
K10bsu019_u:1480: te sarve sahitāḥ samagrā bahirnagarasya saṃprasthitāḥ /
K10bsu019_u:1481: te ca bahirnagarasya gatvā ekānte viśrāntāḥ sāṃkathyaṃ kartumārabdhāḥ - kasya kīdṛśī bhāryā snehavatī?
K10bsu019_u:1489: tadā teṣāṃ vaṇikpuruṣāṇāṃ pratyāhāraṃ karoti sma - na yuṣmākaṃ yuktamidaṃ yadvayaṃ rākṣasībhiḥ prasaktāḥ /
K10bsu019_u:1490: iti śrutvā te vihvalībhūtāḥ evamāhuḥ - satyaṃ mahāsārthavāha,
K10bsu019_u:1492: tadā teṣāṃ mayā pratyāhāraḥ kṛtaḥ - satyaṃ satyaṃ buddhadharmasaṃghebhyaṃ,
K10bsu019_u:1494: atha te vaṇikpuruṣāḥ kathayanti - kāsmākaṃ gatiḥ?
K10bsu019_u:1496: tadā teṣāṃ mayā pratyāhāraḥ kṛtaḥ - asmākaṃ gatiḥ śaraṇaṃ parāyaṇam? (Vaidya 287)
K10bsu019_u:1498: atha sa teṣāmevamāha - asti yuṣmākaṃ siṃhaladvīpe bālāho nāma aśvarājaḥ /
K10bsu019_u:1501: kṛtvā ca śarīraṃ pracchoḍayitvā vāṇīṃ pratyāharediti - kaḥ pāragāmī kaḥ pāragāmī kaḥ pāragāmīti /
K10bsu019_u:1503: atha te vaṇikpurūṣā ūcuḥ - katame dine gacchāmo vayam?
K10bsu019_u:1504: sa pratyāhāraṃ kartumārabdhaḥ - tṛtīye divase 'vaśyaṃ gantavyam /
K10bsu019_u:1506: te kriyākāraṃ kṛtvā punareva tannagaraṃ praviṣṭāḥ svakasvakaṃ niveśanamupagatā /
K10bsu019_u:1509: sa kathayati - na ca te kiṃcid dṛṣṭam /
K10bsu019_u:1510: atha sā rākṣasī tametadavocat - santi āryaputra vividhānyasmin siṃhaladvīpe udyānaramaṇīyāni puṣkariṇīramaṇīyāni vividhavicitrapuṣpaparipūrṇāni
K10bsu019_u:1512: sa pratyāhāraṃ kartumārabdhaḥ - tṛtīye divase gamiṣyāmītyataḥ saṃbalaṃ kartavyam /
K10bsu019_u:1514: tāni ca vividhāni puṣkariṇīśatāni ramaṇīyāni udyānaśatāni puṣpaparipūrṇāni paśyāmi /
K10bsu019_u:1515: tāni ca vividhāni puṣpāṇi gṛhītvā āgamiṣyāmi /
K10bsu019_u:1524: sā kathayati rākṣasī - āryaputra kiṃ kāraṇaṃ ucchvāsaṃ choritam?
K10bsu019_u:1525: atha sa tāmetadavocat - svadeśābhiratā jāmbudvīpakā manuṣyāḥ /
K10bsu019_u:1526: sā āha - kiṃ karoṣyāryaputra svakīyena viṣayena?
K10bsu019_u:1527: asminneva siṃhaladvīpe vividhānyannagṛhāṇi pānagṛhāṇi vastragṛhāṇi vividhānyudyānaramaṇīyāni puṣkariṇīramaṇīyāni /
K10bsu019_u:1533: tṛtīye divase pratyūṣakālasamaye sarve te saṃprasthitāḥ /
K10bsu019_u:1536: na punaḥ kenacit punareva siṃhaladvīpo nirīkṣitavyaḥ /
K10bsu019_u:1538: īdṛśaṃ kriyākāraṃ kṛtvā saṃprasthitāḥ tvaritaṃ tvaritameva laghu laghveva gacchanti /
K10bsu019_u:1544: yadā śarīraṃ pracchoḍayati tadā siṃhaladvīpaṃ calati sma /
K10bsu019_u:1545: trīṇi vākyāni pratyāharati sma - kaḥ pāragāmī,
K10bsu019_u:1555: yadā te ārūḍhāḥ tadā siṃhaladvīpanivāsinyo rākṣasyaḥ kilakilāyamānāḥ pṛṣṭhato dhāvanti sma rudantyaḥ karuṇakaruṇairvilāpaiḥ /
K10bsu019_u:1560: tadā rākṣasya utkṣipya māṃsaṃ bhakṣayanti sma /
K10bsu019_u:1562: tadā tīrasya samīpe bālāhamaśvarājaṃ triḥ pradakṣiṇīkṛtya tatraiva prakrāntaḥ /
K10bsu019_u:1565: tadā me mātāpitārau kaṇṭhe pariṣvajya roditumārabdhau /
K10bsu019_u:1570: tatastau mātāpitarau kathayataḥ sma - jīvaṃstu putra tvamanuprāptaḥ /
K10bsu019_u:1575: yathā śītalo vāto nāma putra āhlādakaraḥ /
K10bsu019_u:1578: tadyathāpi nāma sarvanīvaraṇaviṣkambhin bālāhakaṃ tamaśvarājabhūtenāvalokiteśvareṇa bodhisattvena mahāsattvena tādṛśādahaṃ mṛtyubhayātparimokṣitaḥ
K10bsu019_u:1579: tadyathāpi nāma sarvanīvaraṇaviṣkambhin na śaknomyavalokiteśvarasya puṇyasaṃbhāraṃ gaṇayitum /
K10bsu019_u:1584: tadyathāpi nāma sarvanīvaraṇāviṣkambhin suvarṇaṃ nāma romavivaram /
K10bsu019_u:1586: tena ca saṃsārikena duḥkhena na bādhyante /
K10bsu019_u:1589: tatra na ca te rāgeṇa bādhyante /
K10bsu019_u:1596: tadyathāpi nāma sarvanīvaraṇaviṣkambhin suvarṇanāmaromavivare avabhāsaṃ nāma cintāmaṇiratnam /
K10bsu019_u:1625: tadā mṛgapakṣyādayaḥ saṃvegamāpadyante - sukhaduḥkhamidaṃ sāṃsārikāṇāṃ sattvānām /
K10bsu019_u:1630: ityevaṃ te mṛgapakṣiṇaḥ saṃvegamanuvicintya yadā kāraṇḍavyūhasya mahāyānasūtraratnarājasya nāmānusmaranti,
K10bsu019_u:1638: atha sarvanīvaraṇaviṣkambhī bhagavantametadavocat - yadā bhagavan kāraṇḍavyūhasya mahāyānasūtraratnarājasya nāmānusmaranti,
K10bsu019_u:1641: sukhitāste sattvā ye kāraṇḍavyūhaṃ mahāyānasūtraratnarājaṃ śroṣyanti likhāpayiṣyanti dhārayiṣyanti vācayiṣyanti paryavāpsyanti,
K10bsu019_u:1644: te idaṃ sāṃsārikaṃ duḥkhaṃ na paśyanti /
K10bsu019_u:1647: na ca te khañjakubjakordhvanāsagaṇḍalamboṣṭhāśca sattvāḥ kuṣṭhinaśca santaḥ /
K10bsu019_u:1648: na ca teṣāṃ kāye vyādhiḥ saṃkramate /
K10bsu019_u:1653: anekāni devanāgayakṣagandharvāsuragarūḍakinnaramahoragamanuṣyāmanuṣyā upāsakopāsikāsahasrāṇi saṃnipatitāni - tvayedṛśaṃ dharmasāṃkathyaṃ kṛtam
K10bsu019_u:1655: atha sarvanīvaraṇaviṣkambhī bhagavantametadavocat - yadā bhagavannidaṃ praśnamanirdiṣṭaṃ tadā devaputrāṇāmabhedyā śraddhotpannā /
K10bsu019_u:1656: atha bhagavān sādhukāramadāt - sādhu sādhu kulaputra,
K10bsu019_u:1658: tadyathāpi nāma sarvanīvaraṇaviṣkambhin kṛṣṇānnāma romavivarādavatīrya ratnakuṇḍalo nāma romavivaraḥ /
K10bsu019_u:1660: tāśca gandharvakanyā abhirūpāḥ darśanīyāḥ paramayā śubhavarṇapuṣkalatayā samanvāgatā divyālaṃkāravibhūṣitaśarīrā apsarasāmiva pratispardhinyaḥ
K10bsu019_u:1665: na ca tāsāṃ kāye kiṃcinmānuṣīduḥkhaṃ saṃvidyate /
K10bsu019_u:1674: evameva te kulaputra romavivarā agrāhyā asaṃsparśāḥ /
K10bsu019_u:1675: teṣu romavivareṣu samantabhadro bodhisattvo mahāsattvasteṣāṃ romavivarāṇāṃ dvādaśa varṣāṇi paribhramitaḥ,
K10bsu019_u:1676: na ca tena tāni romavivarāṇi dṛṣṭāṇi /
K10bsu019_u:1680: atha sarvanīvaraṇaviṣkambhī bhagavantametadavocat - yadā bhagavan samantabhadreṇa bodhisattvena mahāsattvena na dṛṣṭaṃ dvādaśavarṣāṇi paribhramatā,
K10bsu019_u:1681: na ca tena tāni romavivarāṇi dṛṣṭāni,
K10bsu019_u:1682: asyaikaikaromavivare sthitaṃ buddhaśataṃ tenāpi na dṛṣṭam,
K10bsu019_u:1685: mayāpi tasya romavivaraṃ vīkṣamāṇena parimārgayamāṇena na dṛśyate /
K10bsu019_u:1689: śatasahasrabhujaḥ koṭiśatasahasranetro viśvarūpī ekādaśaśīrṣaḥ mahāyogī nirvāṇabhūmivyavasthitaḥ
K10bsu019_u:1690: sucetano mahāprājñaḥ bhavottārakaḥ kulīno 'nādarśī prājño nirdeśastathācchāyābhūtaḥ sarvadharmeṣu,
K10bsu019_u:1691: evameva kulaputra avalokiteśvaro bodhisattvo na śruto na kenacid dṛśyate /
K10bsu019_u:1694: acintyo 'yaṃ kulaputra avalokiteśvaro bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prātihāryāṇi samupadarśayati /
K10bsu019_u:1699: atha sarvanīvaraṇaviṣkambhī bhagavantametadavocat - kenopāyena bhagavan paśyāmi ahamavalokiteśvaraṃ bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvam?
K10bsu019_u:1700: bhagavānāha - yadi kulaputra ihaiva sahālokadhātumāgacchati mama darśanāya vandanāya paryupāsanāya /
K10bsu019_u:1705: atha sarvanīvaraṇaviṣkambhī bodhisattvaḥ kare kapolaṃ dattvā cintāparo vyavasthitaḥ
K10bsu019_u:1708: atha sarvanīvaraṇaviṣkambhī bodhisattvaḥ punarapi bhagavantametadavocat - katamasmin kāle bhagavannavalokiteśvara āgacchati?
K10bsu019_u:1711: tadyathāpi nāma kulaputra tato romavivarādavatīrya amṛtabindurnāma romavivaraḥ,
K10bsu019_u:1724: tadyathāpi nāma sarvanīvaraṇaviṣkambhin asminnamṛtabindau romavivare ṣaṣṭiparvatāḥ suvarṇarūpyamayāḥ /
K10bsu019_u:1729: ye tasmin romavivare satatasamitaṃ nirnāditaṃ sūryaṃ dhārayati /
K10bsu019_u:1730: tadyathāpi nāma sarvanīvaraṇaviṣkambhin tasmiṃścāmṛtabindau romavivare anekāni vimānakoṭiniyutaśatasahasrāṇi
K10bsu019_u:1731: ratnaparikhacitāni śobhanīyāni darśanīyāni vicitrāṇi muktāhāraśatasahasrāṇi pralambitāni /
K10bsu019_u:1732: teṣu vimāneṣu bodhisattvā viśramitvā dharmasāṃkathyaṃ kurvanti /
K10bsu019_u:1734: caṃkrame caṃkrame saptati saptati puṣkariṇyaḥ kecidaṣṭāṅgopetena vāriṇā paripūrṇāḥ,
K10bsu019_u:1737: teṣu caṃkrameṣu manoramāḥ kalpavṛkṣāḥ lohitavarṇāḥ suvarṇarūpyapatrā divyālaṃkārapralambitā maulīkuṇḍalasragdāmapralambitā hārārdhahārapralambitāḥ keyūrapralambitāḥ /
K10bsu019_u:1745: evameva sarvanīvaraṇaviṣkambhin tasmin romavivare īdṛśā bodhisattvā vasanti /
K10bsu019_u:1749: satatakālaṃ buddhadharmasaṃghābhiprasannāḥ ekāgradharmamaitrīvihārikāḥ kṣāntisaṃbhāvitā nirvāṇacintakāḥ saṃvegamānuṣyakāḥ /
K10bsu019_u:1753: īdṛśāni ca tatra kulaputra romavivare saddharmanimittāni ca dṛśyante /
K10bsu019_u:1765: evaṃ ṣaṭpāramitāsāṃkathyaṃ kṛtvā svakasvakāni caṃkramaṇāni caṃkramanti /
K10bsu019_u:1767: teṣu caṃkrameṣu sāmantakeṣu kalpavṛkṣā lohitadaṇḍāḥ sauvarṇarūpyapatrā divyālaṃkārapralambitāḥ maulikuṇḍalasragdāmapralambitā hārārdhahārapralambitā ratnahārapralambitāḥ /

K10bsu019_u:2164: sarvadevagaṇāśca brahmaviṣṇumaheśvarāḥ śakraśca devānāmindraścandrādityau vāyuvaruṇādayo yamaśca dharmarājo catvāraśca mahārājānaḥ,
K10bsu019_u:2166: atha sarvanīvaraṇaviṣkambhī tamāha - kathaṃ vayaṃ ṣaḍakṣarīṃ mahāvidyārājñīṃ labhemahi yena vayaṃ kṣipravarā bhavāmaḥ?
K10bsu019_u:2167: dharmabhāṇakastamuvāca - tadyathāpi nāma sarvanīvaraṇaviṣkambhin prajñāpāramitānirjātāḥ sarvatathāgatāḥ /
K10bsu019_u:2169: sāpi ca ṣaḍakṣarīṃ mahāvidyārājñīṃ praṇamate kṛtāñjalipuṭā bhavantī,
K10bsu019_u:2171: ida kulaputra taṇḍulavatsāraṃ mahāyānasya kiṃcidasau bahumahāyānasūtraṃ geyaṃ vyākaraṇagāthānidānetivṛttajātakavaipulyādbhutadharmopadeśakaḥ
K10bsu019_u:2175: kiṃvā tu samadhyagataṃ sāramupagṛhṇanti śālinastathā sāramityanugṛhṇanti,
K10bsu019_u:2176: nītvā svakīye niveśane bhāṇḍāni paripūrṇāni kṛtvā sthāpayitvā divasānurūpeṇa sūryatāpena pariśoṣayitvā musalaprahārairvibhedayanti,
K10bsu019_u:2181: sarvayogānāṃ ceyaṃ ṣaḍakṣarī mahāvidyā rājñī taṇḍulamiti bhūtā draṣṭavyā /
K10bsu019_u:2182: yasyāḥ kāraṇena kulaputra bodhisattvāḥ śrāvayanto bhramanti dānapāramitārthinaḥ,
K10bsu019_u:2192: atha sarvanīvaraṇaviṣkambhī dharmabhāṇakametadavocat - dadasva me ṣaḍakṣarimahāvidyārājñīm /
K10bsu019_u:2193: atha sa dharmabhāṇakaḥ saṃcintya saṃcintya vyavasthitaḥ /
K10bsu019_u:2195: niścarati sma - dadasva ārya ṣaḍakṣarīṃ mahāvidyārājñīm /
K10bsu019_u:2197: punaḥ sa dharmabhāṇakaḥ saṃcintayati sma - kutaḥ śabdo niścarati /
K10bsu019_u:2198: tataḥ sa punarapyākāśācchabdo niścaritaḥ - dadasvārtha ṣaḍakṣarīṃ mahāvidyārājñīm /
K10bsu019_u:2200: atha sa dharmabhāṇaka ākāśaṃ vyavalokayati sma /
K10bsu019_u:2201: yāvatpaśyati śaratkāṇḍagauravarṇaṃ jaṭāmukuṭadharaṃ sarvajñaśirasikṛtaṃ śubhapadmahastaṃ padmaśriyālaṃkṛtaṃ śarīram /
K10bsu019_u:2202: sa tādṛśaṃ rūpaṃ dṛṣṭvā sarvanīvaraṇaviṣkambhiṇaṃ bodhisattvametadavocat - anujñātaste kulaputra avalokiteśvareṇa bodhisattvena ṣaḍakṣarīṃ mahāvidyārājñīm
K10bsu019_u:2205: iyaṃ ca samanantaradattamātreṇa ṣaḍvikāraṃ pṛthivī prakampitā /
K10bsu019_u:2207: tadyathāpi nāma kulaputra sūkṣmajano nāma samādhiḥ,
K10bsu019_u:2215: udgṛhītamātreṇa sarvanīvaraṇaviṣkambhīṇā bodhisattvena tasyopādhyāyasya dakṣiṇopanāmayitumārabdhā - catvāro dvīpāḥ saptaratnaparipūrṇāḥ //
K10bsu019_u:2216: atha sa dharmabhāṇakastasyaitadavocat - ekasyākṣarasyāpi na bhavati dakṣiṇā,
K10bsu019_u:2224: atha sarvanīvaraṇaviṣkambhī tasya dharmabhāṇakasya pādau śirasā vanditvā prakrāntaḥ paripūrṇalābho labdhamanorathaḥ /
K10bsu019_u:2230: atha bhagavān śākyamunistathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddhastametadavocat - labdhalābhastvaṃ kulaputra?
K10bsu019_u:2231: sa āha - yathā bhagavān jñānaṃ saṃjānīte /
K10bsu019_u:2239: tasmin sūryaprabhe romavivare dvādaśaśatasahasrāṇi kanakamayānāṃ parvatānāṃ prativasanti /
K10bsu019_u:2253: janayitvā ca te bodhisattvāstebhyaḥ kūṭāgārebhyo niṣkrāmanti /
K10bsu019_u:2258: gatvā ca paryaṅkamābhujya ṛjukāyaṃ praṇidhāya abhimukhāṃ smṛtimupasthāpya /
K10bsu019_u:2260: tataḥ kulaputra romavivarādavatīrya indrarājo nāma romavivaraḥ /
K10bsu019_u:2263: tatteṣāṃ parvatānāṃ madhye padmāvabhāso nāma cintāmaṇiratnam /
K10bsu019_u:2271: na ca teṣāmanyā cintā śarīre saṃvidyate /
K10bsu019_u:2284: ekaikasmin parvate 'śītiśṛṅgasahasrāṇi vividharatnakhacitāni paramaśobhanīyāni vividhacitrāṇi ramaṇīyāni /
K10bsu019_u:2287: ye te prathamacittotpādikā bodhisattvaste śūnyatānimittaṃ cintayanti /
K10bsu019_u:2294: idaṃ kāye saṃvegamanuvicintya tadā te paryaṅkamābhujya ṛjukāyaṃ praṇidhāya pratimukhāṃ smṛtimupasthāpya teṣuparvatarājeṣu viharanti /
K10bsu019_u:2295: tataḥ kulaputra romavivarādavatīrya cittarājo nama romavivaraḥ /
K10bsu019_u:2300: teṣu parvatarājeṣu vividhāni kalpavṛkṣāṇi sauvarṇadaṇḍāni rūpyapatrāṇyanekaratnakhacitāni
K10bsu019_u:2305: tadā sarvanīvaraṇaviṣkambhī tato romavivarādavatīrya sarvapaścimo 'yaṃ romavivaraḥ dhvajāgro nāma romavivaraḥ /
K10bsu019_u:2313: tasmin romavivare navanavatikūṭāgāraśatasahasrāṇi divyasauvarṇamayāni muktāhārapaṭadāmakalāpapralambitāni ghaṇṭāmālāpralambitāni candrakāntiratnāvabhāsitāni
K10bsu019_u:2315: te jāmbūdvīpakānāṃ manuṣyāṇāṃ ca dharmaṃ deśayanti /
K10bsu019_u:2323: evaṃ vividhāṃ dharmadeśanāṃ kṛtvā jāmbudvīpakānāṃ manuṣyāṇāṃ kālena kālaṃ dharma deśayanti /
K10bsu019_u:2324: evaṃ te kulaputra avalokiteśvarasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya romavivarāṇi yāvatpaśyanti /
K10bsu019_u:2331: bhagavānāha - tataḥ kulaputra romavivarādatikramya avalokiteśvarasya dakṣiṇaṃ pādāṅguṣṭhaṃ yatra te catvāro mahāsamudrāḥ paribhramanti,
K10bsu019_u:2337: atha sarvanīvaraṇaviṣkambhī bhagavantametadavocat - tadapi bhagavan romavivaraṃ saṃvidyate?
K10bsu019_u:2341: asminneva jetavanamahāvihāre mama darśanāya vandanāya paryupāsanāya,
K10bsu019_u:2342: maheśvarasya devaputrasya sahāyā lokadhātau vyākaraṇamuddeśāya ca //
K10bsu019_u:2345: āgatya bhagavantaṃ triḥ pradakṣiṇīkṛtya punareva jetavanādvihārānniṣkramya avīciṃ mahānarakaṃ gacchanti /
K10bsu019_u:2347: atha sarvanīvaraṇaviṣkambhī bhagavantametadavocat - kuto bhagavan raśmaya āgacchanti kutra gacchanti?
K10bsu019_u:2348: bhagavānāha - evaṃ kulaputra avalokiteśvareṇa nānāvidhā raśmaya utsṛṣṭāḥ /
K10bsu019_u:2350: āgatya ca māṃ triḥ pradakṣiṇīkṛtya avīciṃ mahānarakaṃ gacchanti /
K10bsu019_u:2359: atha tasmin jetavanavihāre praviṣṭo bhagavataḥ pādau śirasābhivandya ekānte sthitaḥ /
K10bsu019_u:2362: athāvalokiteśvaro bodhisattvo mahāsattvo bhagavantametadavocat - yathājñapto bhagavatā /
K10bsu019_u:2364: atha bhagavān sādhukāramadāt - sādhu sādhu kulaputra,
K10bsu019_u:2366: athāvalokiteśvaro bhagavantaṃ padmānyupanāmayati - imāni te bhagavannamitābhena tathāgatena prahitāni /
K10bsu019_u:2367: pṛcchatyalpābādhatāṃ ca alpātaṅkatāṃ ca laghūtthānatāṃ ca sukhasparśavihāratāṃ ca /
K10bsu019_u:2370: upasaṃkramya bhagavataḥ pādau śirasābhivandya bhagavantametadavocat - labheyāhaṃ bhagavan vyākaraṇanirdeśasya samuddeśam?
K10bsu019_u:2372: gaccha kulaputra avalokiteśvaro bodhisattvo mahāsattvaste vyākaraṇaṃ dāsyati /
K10bsu019_u:2373: atha maheśvaro devaputro 'valokiteśvarasya pādayornipatya stotraviśeṣaṃ kartumārabdhaḥ -
K10bsu019_u:2374: namostvalokiteśvarāya maheśvarāya padmadharāya padmāsanāya padmapriyāya śubhapadmahastāya padmaśriye parivṛtāya jagadāsvādanakarāya pṛthivīvaralocanakarāya prahlādanakarāya //
K10bsu019_u:2375: evaṃ maheśvaro devaputro gatvā avalokiteśvarasya stotraviśeṣaṃ kṛtvā tūṣṇīṃbhāvena vyavasthitaḥ /
K10bsu019_u:2376: atha avalokiteśvarastametadavocat - kiṃ kāraṇaṃ tvaṃ kulaputra tūṣṇīṃbhāvena vyavasthitaḥ?
K10bsu019_u:2377: atha maheśvaro devaputrastametadavocat - dadasva me vyākaraṇamanuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau /
K10bsu019_u:2378: avalokiteśvarastametadavocat - bhaviṣyasi tvaṃ kulaputra vivṛtāyāṃ lokadhātau bhasmeśvaro
K10bsu019_u:2379: nāma tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddho vidyācaraṇasaṃpannaḥ sugato lokavidanuttaraḥ
K10bsu019_u:2380: puruṣadamyasārathiḥ śāstā devānāṃ ca manuṣyāṇāṃ ca buddho bhagavān /
K10bsu019_u:2381: atha sā umādevyupasaṃkramyāvalokiteśvarasya pādau śirasā vanditvā avalokiteśvarasya stotrābhidhānaṃ kartumārabdhāḥ -
K10bsu019_u:2382: namo 'stvalokiteśvarāya meheśvarāya prāṇaṃdadāya pṛthivīvaralocanakarāya śubhapadmaśriye parivṛtāya nirvāṇabhūmisaṃprasthitāya sucetanakarāya dharmadharāya //
K10bsu019_u:2383: evaṃ sā umādevī stotrābhidhānaṃ kṛtvā avalokiteśvarasya pratyāhāraṃ kartumārabdhā -
K10bsu019_u:2386: athāvalokiteśvarastāmetadavocat - bhaviṣyasi tvaṃ bhagini umeśvaro nāma tathāgato
K10bsu019_u:2388: śāstā devānāṃ ca manuṣyāṇāṃ ca buddho bhagavān /
K10bsu019_u:2389: himavataḥ parvatarājasya dakṣiṇe pārśve tava lokadhāturbhaviṣyati /
K10bsu019_u:2392: vyākṛtā umādevī avalokiteśveraṇa bodhisattvena mahāsattvena sarve te 'nuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau //
K10bsu019_u:2393: ayaṃ kulaputra maheśvaranirvyūho nāma khyāta iti //
K10bsu019_u:2403: atha sarvanīvaraṇaviṣkambhī punareva bhagavantametadavocat - adyāsmākaṃ bhagavan deśaya tvamavalokiteśvarasya guṇaviśeṣam //
K10bsu019_u:2404: bhagavānāha - tadyathāpi nāma sarvanīvaraṇaviṣkambhin cakravālamahācakravālau parvatarājānau /
K10bsu019_u:2417: eteṣu parvatarājeṣvekaikaṃ lokadhātuṣu śakyate mayā parvatarājānāṃ palāni vā palaśatāni
K10bsu019_u:2418: vā palasahasrāṇi vā palakoṭīniyutaśatasahasrāṇi vā saṃkhyāmapi kalāmapi gaṇanāmapi
K10bsu019_u:2420: na tu kulaputra avalokiteśvarasya śakyate puṇyasaṃbhāraṃ gaṇayitum /
K10bsu019_u:2421: tadyathāpi nāma kulaputra śakyate mayā paramāṇurajasāṃ pramāṇamudgṛhītum,
K10bsu019_u:2422: na tu kulaputra avalokiteśvarasya śakyate puṇyasaṃbhāraṃ gaṇayitum /
K10bsu019_u:2423: tadyathāpi nāma kulaputra śakyate mayā mahāsamudrasyaikaikaṃ binduṃ gaṇayitum,
K10bsu019_u:2424: na tu kulaputra avalokiteśvarasya śakyate mayā puṇyasaṃbhāraṃ gaṇayitum /
K10bsu019_u:2425: tadyathāpi nāma kulaputra śakyate mayā śīrṣavanasyaikaikāni patrāṇi gaṇayitum,
K10bsu019_u:2426: na tu kulaputra avalokiteśvarasya śakyate puṇyasaṃbhāraṃ gaṇayitum //
K10bsu019_u:2427: tadyathāpi nāma kulaputra sumeruḥ parvatarājo bhūryarāśirbhavet /
K10bsu019_u:2429: caturdvīpanivāsinaḥ strīpuruṣadārakadārikādayaḥ sarve te lekhakā bhaveyuḥ /
K10bsu019_u:2433: tadyathāpi nāma sarvanīvaraṇaviṣkambhin dvādaśa gaṅgānadīvālukopamāstathāgatā arhantaḥ
K10bsu019_u:2438: tadyathāpi nāma sarvanīvaraṇaviṣkambhin avalokiteśvaraḥ anekaiḥ samādhiśataiḥ samanvāgataḥ /
K10bsu019_u:2478: tadyathāpi nāma sarvanīvaraṇaviṣkambhin bhūtapūrvaṃ kulaputra krakucchando nāma tathāgato
K10bsu019_u:2479: 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddho loka udapādi vidyācaraṇasaṃpannaḥ sugato lokavidanuttaraḥ puruṣadamyasārathiḥ
K10bsu019_u:2480: śāstā devānāṃ ca manuṣyāṇāṃ ca buddho bhagavān /
K10bsu019_u:2481: tena kālena tena samayena ahaṃ dānaśūro nāma bodhisattvo 'bhūvam /
K10bsu019_u:2482: tadā etasya tathāgatasya puraḥ sthitvā īdṛśamavalokiteśvarasamantabhadrayoḥ samādhivigraho mayā dṛṣṭaḥ /
K10bsu019_u:2484: yadā samantabhadro bodhisattvo vajrodgataṃ nāma samādhiṃ samāpede,
K10bsu019_u:2488: yadā samantabhadro vicchuritaṃ nāma samādhiṃ samāpede,
K10bsu019_u:2490: yadā samantabhadra ākārakaraṃ nāma samādhiṃ samāpede,
K10bsu019_u:2492: yadā samantabhadro bhadrarājaṃ nāma samādhiṃ samāpede,
K10bsu019_u:2493: tadā avalokiteśvaraḥ sāgaragambhīraṃ nāma samādhiṃ samāpede /
K10bsu019_u:2494: yadā samantabhadraḥ siṃhaviṣkambhitaṃ nāma samādhiṃ samāpede,
K10bsu019_u:2496: yadā samantabhadro varadāyakaṃ nāma samādhiṃ samāpede,
K10bsu019_u:2502: atha krakucchandastathāgatastametadavocat - alpaṃ tvayā kulaputra avalokiteśvarasya pratibhānaṃ dṛṣṭam /
K10bsu019_u:2503: yādṛśamavalokiteśvarasya pratibhānaṃ tādṛśaṃ tathāgatānāṃ na saṃvidyate /
K10bsu019_u:2504: īdṛśaṃ mayā kulaputra krakucchandasya tathāgatasya sakāśācchrutam //
K10bsu019_u:2505: atha sarvanīvaraṇaviṣkambhī bhagavantametadavocat - deśayatu me bhagavān kāraṇḍavyūhaṃ mahāyānasūtraratnarājaṃ yena vayaṃ dharmarasenāpūryamāṇāḥ saṃtṛptāḥ bhavema /
K10bsu019_u:2506: bhagavānāha - ye kulaputra kāraṇḍavyūhamahāyānasūtraratnarājasya nāma śroṣyanti,
K10bsu019_u:2510: īdṛśānāṃ pāparatānāṃ sattvānāṃ tadapi kāraṇḍavyūho mahāyānasūtraratnarājaḥ sarvapāpaparimokṣaṇaṃ kurute //
K10bsu019_u:2511: atha sarvanīvaraṇaviṣkambhī bhagavantametadavocat - kathaṃ jānāmyahaṃ bhagavan kāraṇḍavyūhaṃ mahāyānasūtraratnarājaṃ sarvapāpaparimokṣaṇaṃ kurute?
K10bsu019_u:2512: bhagavānāha - asti kulaputra sumeroḥ parvatarājasya dakṣiṇapārśve saptabhiḥ samyaksaṃbuddhairmalanirmalau tīrthau parikalpitau /
K10bsu019_u:2516: evameva kulaputra idaṃ kāraṇḍavyūhaṃ mahāyānasūtraratnarājaṃ sarvapāpāni dahati /
K10bsu019_u:2518: tadyathāpi nāma sarvanīvaraṇaviṣkambhin varṣākālasamaye sarvāṇi tṛṇagulmauṣadhivanaspatayaḥ sarve nīlābhi(rūpā) bhavanti /
K10bsu019_u:2519: atha śatamukho nāma nāgarājaḥ bhavanādavatīrya sarvāstā tṛṇagulmauṣadhivanaspatīrdahati /
K10bsu019_u:2520: evamevāyaṃ kulaputraṃ kāraṇḍavyūhaṃ mahāyānasūtraratnarājaṃ sarvapāpāni dahati,
K10bsu019_u:2523: ya imaṃ kāraṇḍavyūhaṃ mahāyānasūtraṃ ratnarājaṃ (Vaidya 307) śroṣyanti /
K10bsu019_u:2524: na te kulaputra pṛthagjanā iti vaktavyāḥ /
K10bsu019_u:2526: teṣāṃ ca maraṇakāraṇasamaye dvādaśa tathāgatā upasaṃkramya āśvāsayanti - mā bhaiṣīḥ kulaputra /
K10bsu019_u:2533: evaṃ kulaputra teṣāṃ sattvānāṃ sukhamaraṇaṃ bhaviṣyati /
K10bsu019_u:2534: athāvalokiteśvaro bhagavataḥ pādau śirasābhivandya ekānte prakrāntaḥ /
K10bsu019_u:2536: ta ca devā nāgā yakṣā gandharvā asurā garūḍāḥ kinnarā mahoragā manuṣyāmanuṣyāḥ prakrāntāḥ //
K10bsu019_u:2537: yadā te prakrāntāstadāyuṣmānānando bhagavantametadavocat - deśayatu me bhagavānasmākaṃ śikṣāsaṃvaram /
K10bsu019_u:2541: mārocayitavyaṃ śuddhayate bhadanta nānāvāsaṃ na ca yatra nānāvāse 'sthīni saṃvidyante /
K10bsu019_u:2547: kiṃ bahunā? bhikṣavo duḥśīlena bhikṣuṇā nānāvāsaṃ na kartavyam,
K10bsu019_u:2550: duḥśīlānāṃ bhikṣūṇāṃ śīlavatāṃ dakṣiṇīyāṇāṃ madhye āvāso na dātavyaḥ /
K10bsu019_u:2555: atha khalvāyuṣmānānando bhagavantametadavocat - katame kāle bhagavannīdṛśādakṣiṇīyā bhaviṣyanti?
K10bsu019_u:2556: bhagavānāha - tṛtīye varṣaśatagate mama parinirvṛtasya tathāgatasya īdṛśādakṣiṇīyā bhaviṣyanti,
K10bsu019_u:2559: te sāṃghikaṃ mañcapīṭhaṃ vaṃśikopabimbopadhānakaṃ śayanāsanaṃ asatparibhogena paribhokṣyante /
K10bsu019_u:2560: ye ca sāṃghikopacāre uccāraṃ prasrāvaṃ kurvanti,
K10bsu019_u:2561: te vārāṇasyāṃ mahānagaryāmuccāraprasrāve gūḍhamṛttikodare prāṇino jāyante /
K10bsu019_u:2566: hīnendriyā dagdhasthūṇākṛtibhirasthipatravaducchritaiḥ svakeśaromapraticchannaiḥ parvatodarasaṃnibhaiḥ sūcīchidropamamukhaiḥ kāye īdṛśaṃ te duḥkhaṃ pratyanubhavanti /
K10bsu019_u:2577: evaṃ te bahūni varṣaśatāni kāyikaṃ duḥkhaṃ pratyanubhavanti /
K10bsu019_u:2579: te dvādaśa kalpān raurave mahānarake upapadyante /
K10bsu019_u:2587: tadā bhikṣavaḥ karmavāyavo vānti yena te mṛtāḥ purūṣāḥ punareva jīvanti /
K10bsu019_u:2589: tataḥ teṣāṃ karmopagānāṃ karmavaśānāṃ mahatī jihvā prādurbhavati /
K10bsu019_u:2591: evaṃ te bahūni varṣaśatāni bahūni varṣasahasrāṇi bahūni varṣaśatasahasrāṇi nārakaṃ duḥkhaṃ pratyanubhavanti /
K10bsu019_u:2593: tataste yamapālapuruṣā gṛhītvā ca tasya jihvāyāṃ sūcīśatasahasraṃ vidhyanti /
K10bsu019_u:2599: evaṃ parikramatāṃ teṣāṃ trayaḥ kalpāḥ parīkṣīyante /
K10bsu019_u:2608: ye śīlavanto guaṇavantaḥ prajñāvantastairbhikṣava imāni śikṣāpadāni mayā prajñaptāni dhārayitavyāni /
K10bsu019_u:2609: asatparibhogena bhikṣavo na paribhoktavyaṃ sāṃghikaṃ vastu agnighaṭopamam /
K10bsu019_u:2614: na tu sāṃghikasya vastunaḥ pratikāraṃ kartuṃ śakyate //
K10bsu019_u:2622: āyuṣmānānando bhagavataḥ pādau śirasā vanditvā prakrāntaḥ /
K10bsu019_u:2623: atha te mahāśrāvakāḥ svakaṃ svakaṃ buddhakṣetraṃ prakrāntāḥ /
K10bsu019_u:2624: te ca devā nāgā yakṣā gandharvā asurā garuḍāḥ kinnarā mahoragā manuṣyāḥ,
K10bsu019_u:2629: te ca bodhisattvāḥ sā ca sarvāvatī parṣat sadevamānuṣāsuragandharvaśca loko bhagavato bhāṣitamabhyanandanniti //
K10bsu019_u:2632: ye dharma hetuprabhavā hetusteṣāṃ tathāgato hyavadat /
K10bsu019_u:2633: teṣāṃ ca yo nirodha evaṃ vādī mahāśramaṇaḥ //
